```javascript
// ===== ë¬¸ì œ ì‚­ì œ =====
function deleteQuestion(btn) {
  const card = btn.closest('.question-card');
  card.remove();
  
  // ë¬¸ì œ ë²ˆí˜¸ ë‹¤ì‹œ ë§¤ê¸°ê¸°
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.question-card');
  cards.forEach((card, index) => {
    card.querySelector('.question-number').textContent = `ë¬¸ì œ ${index + 1}`;
  });
}

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• í† ê¸€ =====
function toggleQuestionType(select) {
  const card = select.closest('.question-card');
  const multipleOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="multiple"]');
  const oxOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="ox"]');
  const textOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="text"]');
  const sliderOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="slider"]');
  
  // ëª¨ë“  ì˜µì…˜ ìˆ¨ê¸°ê¸°
  multipleOptions.style.display = 'none';
  oxOptions.style.display = 'none';
  textOptions.style.display = 'none';
  sliderOptions.style.display = 'none';
  
  // ì„ íƒëœ ìœ í˜•ë§Œ í‘œì‹œ
  switch (select.value) {
    case 'multiple':
      multipleOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'ox':
      oxOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'text':
      textOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'slider':
      sliderOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
  }
}

// ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë°ì´í„° ìˆ˜ì§‘ =====
function collectQuizData() {
  const title = document.getElementById('quiz-title').value.trim();
  
  if (!title) {
    showToast('í€´ì¦ˆ ì œëª©ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return null;
  }
  
  const questionCards = document.querySelectorAll('.question-card');
  
  if (questionCards.length === 0) {
    showToast('ìµœì†Œ 1ê°œ ì´ìƒì˜ ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return null;
  }
  
  const questions = [];
  
  for (const card of questionCards) {
    const questionText = card.querySelector('[data-field="question"]').value.trim();
    const type = card.querySelector('[data-field="type"]').value;
    const timeLimit = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="timeLimit"]').value);
    
    if (!questionText) {
      showToast('ëª¨ë“  ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
      return null;
    }
    
    const questionData = {
      question: questionText,
      type,
      timeLimit
    };
    
    if (type === 'multiple') {
      const options = [];
      const optionInputs = card.querySelectorAll('[data-option]');
      
      for (const input of optionInputs) {
        const optionText = input.value.trim();
        if (!optionText) {
          showToast('ëª¨ë“  ë³´ê¸°ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
          return null;
        }
        options.push(optionText);
      }
      
      questionData.options = options;
      questionData.correctAnswer = parseInt(card.querySelector('.option-radio:checked').value);
    } else if (type === 'ox') {
      questionData.options = ['O', 'X'];
      questionData.correctAnswer = card.querySelector('.ox-radio:checked').value;
    } else if (type === 'text') {
      const textAnswer = card.querySelector('[data-field="textAnswer"]').value.trim();
      if (!textAnswer) {
        showToast('ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ì •ë‹µì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
        return null;
      }
      questionData.options = null;
      questionData.correctAnswer = textAnswer;
    } else if (type === 'slider') {
      const min = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="min"]').value);
      const max = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="max"]').value);
      const answer = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="sliderAnswer"]').value);
      
      questionData.options = { min, max };
      questionData.correctAnswer = answer;
    }
    
    questions.push(questionData);
  }
  
  return { title, questions };
}

// ===== ë°© ìƒì„± =====
function createRoom() {
  const quizData = collectQuizData();
  
  if (!quizData) return;
  
  const btn = document.getElementById('create-room-btn');
  btn.disabled = true;
  btn.querySelector('.btn-text').textContent = 'ìƒì„± ì¤‘...';
  
  socket.emit('create-room', quizData, (response) => {
    btn.disabled = false;
    btn.querySelector('.btn-text').textContent = 'ë°© ë§Œë“¤ê¸°';
    
    if (response.success) {
      currentRoomCode = response.roomCode;
      isHost = true;
      
      document.getElementById('room-code-display').textContent = response.roomCode;
      showScreen('host-lobby');
      showToast('ë°©ì´ ìƒì„±ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'ğŸ‰');
    } else {
      showToast('ë°© ìƒì„±ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.', 'âŒ');
    }
  });
}

// ===== ë°© ì°¸ê°€ =====
function joinRoom() {
  const nickname = document.getElementById('nickname').value.trim();
  const roomCode = document.getElementById('room-code-input').value.trim().toUpperCase();
  
  if (!nickname) {
    showToast('ë‹‰ë„¤ì„ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  if (!roomCode || roomCode.length !== 6) {
    showToast('6ìë¦¬ ì°¸ê°€ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  socket.emit('join-room', { roomCode, nickname }, (response) => {
    if (response.success) {
      currentRoomCode = roomCode;
      isHost = false;
      
      document.getElementById('player-nickname').textContent = nickname;
      document.getElementById('quiz-title-display').textContent = response.quizTitle;
      document.getElementById('player-count-display').textContent = response.participantCount;
      
      showScreen('player-lobby');
      showToast(`${response.quizTitle}ì— ì°¸ê°€í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!`, 'ğŸ®');
    } else {
      showToast(response.message, 'âŒ');
    }
  });
}

// ===== ê²Œì„ ì‹œì‘ (í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸) =====
function startGame() {
  if (!currentRoomCode || !isHost) return;
  
  socket.emit('start-game', currentRoomCode);
}

// ===== ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitAnswer(answerIndex) {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  
  // ì„ íƒí•œ ë²„íŠ¼ í‘œì‹œ
  const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.answer-btn');
  buttons.forEach((btn, index) => {
    if (index === answerIndex) {
      btn.classList.add('selected');
    }
    btn.disabled = true;
  });
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {
    roomCode: currentRoomCode,
    questionIndex: currentQuestion.index,
    answer: answerIndex,
    timeRemaining
  });
  
  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitSliderAnswer() {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  
  const slider = document.querySelector('.slider-input');
  const value = parseInt(slider.value);
  
  document.querySelector('.submit-slider-btn').disabled = true;
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {
    roomCode: currentRoomCode,
    questionIndex: currentQuestion.index,
    answer: value,
    timeRemaining
  });
  
  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitTextAnswer() {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  const input = document.getElementById('text-answer-input');
  const answer = input.value.trim();
  
  if (!answer) {
    showToast('ë‹µë³€ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  input.disabled = true;
  document.querySelector('.submit-text-btn').disabled = true;
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {
    roomCode: currentRoomCode,
    questionIndex: currentQuestion.index,
    answer: answer,
    timeRemaining
  });
  
  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ ì‹œì‘ =====
function startTimer(duration) {
  timeRemaining = duration;
  
  const timerBar = document.getElementById('timer-bar');
  const timerText = document.getElementById('timer-text');
  
  timerBar.style.width = '100%';
  timerText.textContent = duration;
  
  if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
  
  timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
    timeRemaining--;
    
    const percentage = (timeRemaining / duration) * 100;
    timerBar.style.width = `${percentage}%`;
    timerText.textContent = timeRemaining;
    
    if (timeRemaining <= 0) {
      clearInterval(timerInterval);
    }
  }, 1000);
}

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayQuestion(questionData) {
  currentQuestion = questionData;
  hasAnswered = false;
  
  document.getElementById('current-q').textContent = questionData.index + 1;
  document.getElementById('total-q').textContent = questionData.total;
  document.getElementById('question-text').textContent = questionData.question;
  
  const answersContainer = document.getElementById('answers-container');
  answersContainer.innerHTML = '';
  
  if (questionData.type === 'multiple') {
    questionData.options.forEach((option, index) => {
      const btn = document.createElement('button');
      btn.className = 'answer-btn';
      btn.textContent = option;
      btn.onclick = () => submitAnswer(index);
      answersContainer.appendChild(btn);
    });
  } else if (questionData.type === 'ox') {
    // OX í€´ì¦ˆ
    const oxContainer = document.createElement('div');
    oxContainer.className = 'ox-answer-container';
    oxContainer.innerHTML = `
      <button class="answer-btn ox-btn ox-o-btn" onclick="submitAnswer('O')">â­• O</button>
      <button class="answer-btn ox-btn ox-x-btn" onclick="submitAnswer('X')">âŒ X</button>
    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(oxContainer);
  } else if (questionData.type === 'text') {
    // ì£¼ê´€ì‹
    const textContainer = document.createElement('div');
    textContainer.className = 'text-answer-container';
    textContainer.innerHTML = `
      <input type="text" class="text-answer-input" id="text-answer-input" placeholder="ì •ë‹µì„ ì…ë ¥í•˜ì„¸ìš”" autocomplete="off">
      <button class="submit-text-btn retro-btn" onclick="submitTextAnswer()">ì œì¶œí•˜ê¸°</button>
    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(textContainer);
    
    // ì—”í„°í‚¤ë¡œ ì œì¶œ
    setTimeout(() => {
      const input = document.getElementById('text-answer-input');
      input.focus();
      input.addEventListener('keypress', (e) => {
        if (e.key === 'Enter') submitTextAnswer();
      });
    }, 100);
  } else if (questionData.type === 'slider') {
    // ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” íƒ€ì…
    const sliderContainer = document.createElement('div');
    sliderContainer.className = 'slider-container';
    sliderContainer.innerHTML = `
      <div class="slider-value" id="slider-value">${Math.round((questionData.options.min + questionData.options.max) / 2)}</div>
      <input type="range" class="slider-input" 
        min="${questionData.options.min}" 
        max="${questionData.options.max}" 
        value="${Math.round((questionData.options.min + questionData.options.max) / 2)}"
        oninput="document.getElementById('slider-value').textContent = this.value">
      <div class="slider-labels">
        <span>${questionData.options.min}</span>
        <span>${questionData.options.max}</span>
      </div>
      <button class="submit-slider-btn retro-btn" onclick="submitSliderAnswer()">ì œì¶œí•˜ê¸°</button>
    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(sliderContainer);
  }
  
  // ë‹µë³€ í˜„í™© ì´ˆê¸°í™”
  document.getElementById('answered-count').textContent = '0';
  
  showScreen('game-screen');
  startTimer(questionData.timeLimit);
}

// ===== ì •ë‹µ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayAnswer(data) {
  if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
  
  const title = document.getElementById('answer-result-title');
  const correctAnswerEl = document.getElementById('correct-answer');
  
  // í˜„ì¬ ì‚¬ìš©ìì˜ ê²°ê³¼ ì°¾ê¸°
  const myResult = data.results.find(r => r.id === socket.id);
  
  if (isHost) {
    title.textContent = 'ì •ë‹µ ê³µê°œ!';
    title.className = 'answer-title';
  } else if (myResult) {
    if (myResult.isCorrect) {
      title.textContent = 'ì •ë‹µ! ğŸ‰';
      title.className = 'answer-title correct';
    } else {
      title.textContent = 'ì˜¤ë‹µ... ğŸ˜¢';
      title.className = 'answer-title incorrect';
    }
  }
  
  // ì •ë‹µ í‘œì‹œ
  if (currentQuestion.type === 'multiple') {
    correctAnswerEl.textContent = currentQuestion.options[data.correctAnswer];
  } else {
    correctAnswerEl.textContent = data.correctAnswer;
  }
  
  // ìˆœìœ„í‘œ í‘œì‹œ
  const leaderboard = document.getElementById('leaderboard-mini');
  leaderboard.innerHTML = data.results.slice(0, 5).map((result, index) => `
    <div class="leaderboard-item">
      <span class="leaderboard-rank">${index + 1}.</span>
      <span class="leaderboard-name">${result.nickname}</span>
      <span class="leaderboard-score">${result.totalScore}ì </span>
      ${result.pointsEarned > 0 ? `<span class="leaderboard-points">+${result.pointsEarned}</span>` : ''}
    </div>
  `).join('');
  
  showScreen('answer-screen');
}

// ===== ìµœì¢… ê²°ê³¼ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayFinalResults(data) {
  const results = data.results;
  
  // ì‹œìƒëŒ€ í‘œì‹œ
  const places = ['place-1', 'place-2', 'place-3'];
  const podiumOrder = [1, 0, 2]; // 2ë“±, 1ë“±, 3ë“± ìˆœì„œ
  
  places.forEach((placeId, displayIndex) => {
    const place = document.getElementById(placeId);
    const resultIndex = podiumOrder[displayIndex];
    
    if (results[resultIndex]) {
      place.querySelector('.player-name').textContent = results[resultIndex].nickname;
      place.querySelector('.player-score').textContent = `${results[resultIndex].score}ì `;
      place.style.display = 'flex';
    } else {
      place.style.display = 'none';
    }
  });
  
  // ì „ì²´ ìˆœìœ„ í‘œì‹œ
  const fullResults = document.getElementById('full-results');
  fullResults.innerHTML = results.slice(3).map((result, index) => `
    <div class="result-item">
      <span class="result-rank">${index + 4}.</span>
      <span class="result-name">${result.nickname}</span>
      <span class="result-score">${result.score}ì </span>
    </div>
  `).join('');
  
  showScreen('results-screen');
}
```

```javascript
// ===== ë¬¸ì œ ì‚­ì œ =====
function deleteQuestion(btn) {
  const card = btn.closest('.question-card');
  card.remove();
  
  // ë¬¸ì œ ë²ˆí˜¸ ë‹¤ì‹œ ë§¤ê¸°ê¸°

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• í† ê¸€ =====
function toggleQuestionType(select) {
  const card = select.closest('.question-card');
  const multipleOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="multiple"]');
  const oxOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="ox"]');
  const textOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="text"]');
  const sliderOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="slider"]');
  
  // ëª¨ë“  ì˜µì…˜ ìˆ¨ê¸°ê¸°
  multipleOptions.style.display = 'none';
  oxOptions.style.display = 'none';
  textOptions.style.display = 'none';
  sliderOptions.style.display = 'none';
  
  // ì„ íƒëœ ìœ í˜•ë§Œ í‘œì‹œ
  switch (select.value) {
    case 'multiple':
      multipleOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'ox':
      oxOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'text':
      textOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'slider':
      sliderOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
  }
}

// ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë°ì´í„° ìˆ˜ì§‘ =====
function collectQuizData() {
  const title = document.getElementById('quiz-title').value.trim();
  
  if (!title) {
    showToast('í€´ì¦ˆ ì œëª©ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return null;
  }
  
  const questionCards = document.querySelectorAll('.question-card');
  
  if (questionCards.length === 0) {
    showToast('ìµœì†Œ 1ê°œ ì´ìƒì˜ ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return null;
  }
  
  const questions = [];
  
  for (const card of questionCards) {
    const questionText = card.querySelector('[data-field="question"]').value.trim();
    const type = card.querySelector('[data-field="type"]').value;
    const timeLimit = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="timeLimit"]').value);
    
    if (!questionText) {
      showToast('ëª¨ë“  ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
      return null;
    }
    
    const questionData = {
      question: questionText,
      type,
      timeLimit
    };
    
    if (type === 'multiple') {
      const options = [];
      const optionInputs = card.querySelectorAll('[data-option]');
      
      for (const input of optionInputs) {
        const optionText = input.value.trim();
        if (!optionText) {
          showToast('ëª¨ë“  ë³´ê¸°ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
          return null;
        }
        options.push(optionText);
      }
      
      questionData.options = options;
      questionData.correctAnswer = parseInt(card.querySelector('.option-radio:checked').value);
    } else if (type === 'ox') {
      questionData.options = ['O', 'X'];
      questionData.correctAnswer = card.querySelector('.ox-radio:checked').value;
    } else if (type === 'text') {
      const textAnswer = card.querySelector('[data-field="textAnswer"]').value.trim();
      if (!textAnswer) {
        showToast('ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ì •ë‹µì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
        return null;
      }
      questionData.options = null;
      questionData.correctAnswer = textAnswer;
    } else if (type === 'slider') {
      const min = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="min"]').value);
      const max = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="max"]').value);
      const answer = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="sliderAnswer"]').value);
      
      questionData.options = { min, max };
      questionData.correctAnswer = answer;
    }
    
    questions.push(questionData);
  }
  
  return { title, questions };
}

// ===== ë°© ìƒì„± =====
function createRoom() {
  const quizData = collectQuizData();
  
  if (!quizData) return;
  
  const btn = document.getElementById('create-room-btn');
  btn.disabled = true;
  btn.querySelector('.btn-text').textContent = 'ìƒì„± ì¤‘...';
  
  socket.emit('create-room', quizData, (response) => {
    btn.disabled = false;
    btn.querySelector('.btn-text').textContent = 'ë°© ë§Œë“¤ê¸°';
    
    if (response.success) {
      currentRoomCode = response.roomCode;
      isHost = true;
      
      document.getElementById('room-code-display').textContent = response.roomCode;
      showScreen('host-lobby');
      showToast('ë°©ì´ ìƒì„±ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'ğŸ‰');
    } else {
      showToast('ë°© ìƒì„±ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.', 'âŒ');
    }
  });
}

// ===== ë°© ì°¸ê°€ =====
function joinRoom() {
  const nickname = document.getElementById('nickname').value.trim();
  const roomCode = document.getElementById('room-code-input').value.trim().toUpperCase();
  
  if (!nickname) {
    showToast('ë‹‰ë„¤ì„ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  if (!roomCode || roomCode.length !== 6) {
    showToast('6ìë¦¬ ì°¸ê°€ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  socket.emit('join-room', { roomCode, nickname }, (response) => {
    if (response.success) {
      currentRoomCode = roomCode;

      document.getElementById('player-count-display').textContent = response.participantCount;
      
      showScreen('player-lobby');
      showToast(`${response.quizTitle}ì— ì°¸ê°€í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!`, 'ğŸ®');
    } else {
      showToast(response.message, 'âŒ');
    }
  });
}

function submitAnswer(answerIndex) {

// ===== íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ ì‹œì‘ =====
function startTimer(duration) {
  timeRemaining = duration;
  
  const timerBar = document.getElementById('timer-bar');
  const timerText = document.getElementById('timer-text');
  
  timerBar.style.width = '100%';
  timerText.textContent = duration;
  
  if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
  
  timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
    timeRemaining--;
    
    const percentage = (timeRemaining / duration) * 100;
    timerBar.style.width = `${percentage}%`;
    timerText.textContent = timeRemaining;
    
    if (timeRemaining <= 0) {
      clearInterval(timerInterval);
    }
  }, 1000);
}

socket.on('participant-joined', (data) => {
  const list = document.getElementById('participants-list');
  const waitingText = list.querySelector('.waiting-text');
  if (waitingText) waitingText.remove();
  
  const avatar = avatars[Math.floor(Math.random() * avatars.length)];
  
  const item = document.createElement('div');
  item.className = 'participant-item';
  item.dataset.id = data.participant.id;
  item.innerHTML = `
    <span class="participant-avatar">${avatar}</span>
    <span class="participant-name">${data.participant.nickname}</span>
  `;
  list.appendChild(item);
  
  document.getElementById('participant-count').textContent = data.totalParticipants;
  
  // ê²Œì„ ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼ í™œì„±í™”
  document.getElementById('start-game-btn').disabled = false;
  
  showToast(`${data.participant.nickname}ë‹˜ì´ ì…ì¥í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!`, 'ğŸ„');
});

// ì°¸ì—¬ì í‡´ì¥ (í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸)
socket.on('participant-left', (data) => {
  document.getElementById('participant-count').textContent = data.totalParticipants;
  
  // ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì—ì„œ ì œê±° (í•„ìš”ì‹œ)
  showToast(`${data.nickname}ë‹˜ì´ í‡´ì¥í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.`, 'ğŸ‘‹');
  
  // ì°¸ì—¬ìê°€ ì—†ìœ¼ë©´ ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼ ë¹„í™œì„±í™”
  if (data.totalParticipants === 0) {
    document.getElementById('start-game-btn').disabled = true;
  }
});

// ê²Œì„ ì‹œì‘
socket.on('game-started', (data) => {
  document.getElementById('total-players').textContent = data.totalParticipants || 0;
  showToast('ê²Œì„ì´ ì‹œì‘ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'ğŸ®');
});

// ìƒˆ ë¬¸ì œ

});

// ë‹µë³€ í˜„í™© ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸)
socket.on('answer-submitted', (data) => {
```

ì´ì œ ì„œë²„ì˜ ì ìˆ˜ ê³„ì‚° ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜ì„ ì¹´í›— ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ë¡œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸í•˜ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

```javascript
const express = require('express');
const http = require('http');
const { Server } = require('socket.io');
const { v4: uuidv4 } = require('uuid');
const path = require('path');

const app = express();
const server = http.createServer(app);
const io = new Server(server);

// ì •ì  íŒŒì¼ ì œê³µ
app.use(express.static(path.join(__dirname, 'public')));

// ê²Œì„ ë°© ì €ì¥ì†Œ
const rooms = new Map();

// ë°© ì½”ë“œ ìƒì„± (6ìë¦¬)
function generateRoomCode() {
  return Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 8).toUpperCase();
}

// Socket.io ì—°ê²° ì²˜ë¦¬
io.on('connection', (socket) => {
  console.log('ì‚¬ìš©ì ì—°ê²°:', socket.id);

  // í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ê°€ ë°© ìƒì„±
  socket.on('create-room', (quizData, callback) => {
    const roomCode = generateRoomCode();
    const room = {
      code: roomCode,
      hostId: socket.id,
      quiz: quizData,
      participants: [],
      currentQuestion: -1,
      isStarted: false,
      answers: new Map(),
      scores: new Map()
    };
    
    rooms.set(roomCode, room);
    socket.join(roomCode);
    
    console.log(`ë°© ìƒì„±ë¨: ${roomCode}`);
    callback({ success: true, roomCode });
  });

  // ì°¸ì—¬ìê°€ ë°© ì…ì¥
  socket.on('join-room', ({ roomCode, nickname }, callback) => {
    const room = rooms.get(roomCode);
    
    if (!room) {
      callback({ success: false, message: 'ë°©ì„ ì°¾ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!' });
      return;
    }
    
    if (room.isStarted) {
      callback({ success: false, message: 'ì´ë¯¸ ê²Œì„ì´ ì‹œì‘ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!' });
      return;
    }

    const participant = {
      id: socket.id,
      nickname,
      score: 0
    };
    
    room.participants.push(participant);
    room.scores.set(socket.id, 0);
    socket.join(roomCode);
    socket.roomCode = roomCode;
    socket.nickname = nickname;
    
    // í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì—ê²Œ ìƒˆ ì°¸ì—¬ì ì•Œë¦¼
    io.to(room.hostId).emit('participant-joined', {
      participant,
      totalParticipants: room.participants.length
    });
    
    // ì°¸ì—¬ìì—ê²Œ ì„±ê³µ ì‘ë‹µ
    callback({ 
      success: true, 
      quizTitle: room.quiz.title,
      participantCount: room.participants.length 
    });
    
    console.log(`${nickname}ë‹˜ì´ ë°© ${roomCode}ì— ì…ì¥`);
  });

  // í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ê°€ ê²Œì„ ì‹œì‘
  socket.on('start-game', (roomCode) => {
    const room = rooms.get(roomCode);
    if (!room || room.hostId !== socket.id) return;
    
    room.isStarted = true;
    room.currentQuestion = 0;
    
    // ëª¨ë“  ì°¸ì—¬ìì—ê²Œ ê²Œì„ ì‹œì‘ ì•Œë¦¼
    io.to(roomCode).emit('game-started', {
      totalQuestions: room.quiz.questions.length
    });
    
    // ì²« ë²ˆì§¸ ë¬¸ì œ ì „ì†¡
    sendQuestion(roomCode);
  });

  // ë¬¸ì œ ì „ì†¡
  function sendQuestion(roomCode) {
    const room = rooms.get(roomCode);
    if (!room) return;
    
    const questionIndex = room.currentQuestion;
    const question = room.quiz.questions[questionIndex];
    
    if (!question) {
      // ëª¨ë“  ë¬¸ì œ ì™„ë£Œ - ê²°ê³¼ ë°œí‘œ
      endGame(roomCode);
      return;
    }
    
    // í˜„ì¬ ë¬¸ì œì— ëŒ€í•œ ë‹µë³€ ì´ˆê¸°í™”
    room.answers.set(questionIndex, new Map());
    
    const questionData = {
      index: questionIndex,
      total: room.quiz.questions.length,
      question: question.question,
      type: question.type,
      options: question.options,
      timeLimit: question.timeLimit || 20
    };
    
    io.to(roomCode).emit('new-question', questionData);
    
    // íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ ì‹œì‘
    setTimeout(() => {
      showAnswer(roomCode, questionIndex);
    }, (question.timeLimit || 20) * 1000);
  }

  // ì°¸ì—¬ì ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ
  socket.on('submit-answer', ({ roomCode, questionIndex, answer, timeRemaining }) => {
    const room = rooms.get(roomCode);
    if (!room || !room.isStarted) return;
    
    const questionAnswers = room.answers.get(questionIndex);
    if (!questionAnswers || questionAnswers.has(socket.id)) return;
    
    questionAnswers.set(socket.id, {
      answer,
      timeRemaining
    });
    
    // í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì—ê²Œ ë‹µë³€ í˜„í™© ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
    io.to(room.hostId).emit('answer-submitted', {
      answeredCount: questionAnswers.size,
      totalParticipants: room.participants.length
    });
  });

  // ===== ì¹´í›— ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ì ìˆ˜ ê³„ì‚° =====
  // ê¸°ë³¸ ì ìˆ˜: 1000ì  (ì •ë‹µ ì‹œ)
  // ì‹œê°„ ë³´ë„ˆìŠ¤: ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ë¹„ìœ¨ì— ë”°ë¼ ìµœëŒ€ 500ì  ì¶”ê°€
  // ì—°ì† ì •ë‹µ ë³´ë„ˆìŠ¤: ì—°ì† ì •ë‹µ ì‹œ ë³´ë„ˆìŠ¤ (ìŠ¤íŠ¸ë¦­)
  function calculateKahootScore(isCorrect, timeRemaining, timeLimit, streakCount) {
    if (!isCorrect) return 0;
    
    const BASE_SCORE = 1000;
    const TIME_BONUS_MAX = 500;
    
    // ì‹œê°„ ë³´ë„ˆìŠ¤: ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ë¹„ìœ¨ì˜ ì œê³± (ë¹ ë¥¼ìˆ˜ë¡ ë” í° ë³´ë„ˆìŠ¤)
    const timeRatio = timeRemaining / timeLimit;
    const timeBonus = Math.round(TIME_BONUS_MAX * Math.pow(timeRatio, 2));
    
    // ì—°ì† ì •ë‹µ ë³´ë„ˆìŠ¤ (ìµœëŒ€ 500ì ê¹Œì§€)
    const streakBonus = Math.min(streakCount * 100, 500);
    
    return BASE_SCORE + timeBonus + streakBonus;
  }

  // ì •ë‹µ ê³µê°œ ë° ì ìˆ˜ ê³„ì‚°
  function showAnswer(roomCode, questionIndex) {
    const room = rooms.get(roomCode);
    if (!room) return;
    
    const question = room.quiz.questions[questionIndex];
    const questionAnswers = room.answers.get(questionIndex);
    const timeLimit = question.timeLimit || 20;
    
    // ì ìˆ˜ ê³„ì‚°
    const results = [];
    room.participants.forEach(p => {
      const playerAnswer = questionAnswers?.get(p.id);
      let isCorrect = false;
      let pointsEarned = 0;
      
      // ìŠ¤íŠ¸ë¦­ ì´ˆê¸°í™” (ì—†ìœ¼ë©´)
      if (!room.streaks) room.streaks = new Map();
      let streak = room.streaks.get(p.id) || 0;
      
      if (playerAnswer) {
        if (question.type === 'slider') {
          // ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë”: ì •ë‹µê³¼ì˜ ì°¨ì´ì— ë”°ë¼ ì ìˆ˜
          const diff = Math.abs(playerAnswer.answer - question.correctAnswer);
          const maxDiff = question.options.max - question.options.min;
          const accuracy = 1 - (diff / maxDiff);
          
          // 90% ì´ìƒ ì •í™•ë„ë©´ ì •ë‹µ ì²˜ë¦¬
          isCorrect = accuracy >= 0.9;
          
          if (accuracy > 0) {
            // ì •í™•ë„ì— ë¹„ë¡€í•œ ì ìˆ˜ (ì¹´í›— ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ì ìš©)
            const basePoints = calculateKahootScore(true, playerAnswer.timeRemaining, timeLimit, streak);
            pointsEarned = Math.round(basePoints * accuracy);
          }
        } else if (question.type === 'text') {
          // ì£¼ê´€ì‹: ëŒ€ì†Œë¬¸ì ë¬´ì‹œ, ê³µë°± ì œê±° í›„ ë¹„êµ
          const userAnswer = String(playerAnswer.answer).toLowerCase().trim().replace(/\s+/g, '');
          const correctAnswer = String(question.correctAnswer).toLowerCase().trim().replace(/\s+/g, '');
          isCorrect = userAnswer === correctAnswer;
          
          if (isCorrect) {
            pointsEarned = calculateKahootScore(true, playerAnswer.timeRemaining, timeLimit, streak);
          }
        } else if (question.type === 'ox') {
          // OX í€´ì¦ˆ
          isCorrect = playerAnswer.answer === question.correctAnswer;
          if (isCorrect) {
            pointsEarned = calculateKahootScore(true, playerAnswer.timeRemaining, timeLimit, streak);
          }
        } else {
          // ê°ê´€ì‹ (multiple)
          isCorrect = playerAnswer.answer === question.correctAnswer;
          if (isCorrect) {
            pointsEarned = calculateKahootScore(true, playerAnswer.timeRemaining, timeLimit, streak);
          }
        }
      }
      
      // ìŠ¤íŠ¸ë¦­ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
      if (isCorrect) {
        room.streaks.set(p.id, streak + 1);
      } else {
        room.streaks.set(p.id, 0);
      }
      
      const currentScore = room.scores.get(p.id) || 0;
      room.scores.set(p.id, currentScore + pointsEarned);
      
      results.push({
        id: p.id,
        nickname: p.nickname,
        isCorrect,
        pointsEarned,
        totalScore: currentScore + pointsEarned,
        streak: room.streaks.get(p.id)
      });
    });
    
    // ì ìˆ˜ ìˆœìœ¼ë¡œ ì •ë ¬
    results.sort((a, b) => b.totalScore - a.totalScore);
    
    io.to(roomCode).emit('show-answer', {
      correctAnswer: question.correctAnswer,
      explanation: question.explanation,
      results
    });
    
    // 5ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ìŒ ë¬¸ì œ
    setTimeout(() => {
      room.currentQuestion++;
      sendQuestion(roomCode);
    }, 5000);
  }

  // ê²Œì„ ì¢…ë£Œ
  function endGame(roomCode) {
    const room = rooms.get(roomCode);
    if (!room) return;
    
    const finalResults = room.participants.map(p => ({
      nickname: p.nickname,
      score: room.scores.get(p.id) || 0
    })).sort((a, b) => b.score - a.score);
    
    io.to(roomCode).emit('game-ended', { results: finalResults });
  }

  // ì—°ê²° í•´ì œ
  socket.on('disconnect', () => {
    console.log('ì‚¬ìš©ì ì—°ê²° í•´ì œ:', socket.id);
    
    // ì°¸ì—¬ìê°€ ë‚˜ê°„ ê²½ìš° ë°©ì—ì„œ ì œê±°
    if (socket.roomCode) {
      const room = rooms.get(socket.roomCode);
      if (room) {
        room.participants = room.participants.filter(p => p.id !== socket.id);
        
        // í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì—ê²Œ ì•Œë¦¼
        io.to(room.hostId).emit('participant-left', {
          nickname: socket.nickname,
          totalParticipants: room.participants.length
        });
      }
    }
    
    // í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ê°€ ë‚˜ê°„ ê²½ìš° ë°© ì‚­ì œ
    rooms.forEach((room, code) => {
      if (room.hostId === socket.id) {
        io.to(code).emit('room-closed');
        rooms.delete(code);
        console.log(`ë°© ${code} ì‚­ì œë¨ (í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ í‡´ì¥)`);
      }
    });
  });
});

  console.log(`http://localhost:${PORT}`);
});
```

```css
/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {

.block {

}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;

  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {

}
```

```css
/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;
  --font-pixel-en: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

/* ===== ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 16px;
  background: var(--bg-gradient);
  min-height: 100vh;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow-soft);
}

.game-container {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* ===== ë°°ê²½ ì¥ì‹ (ê¹”ë”í•œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) ===== */
.cloud, .ground, .pipe, .brick {
  display: none;
}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 75% 75%, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  z-index: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ê¸°ë³¸ ===== */
.screen {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 80px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
  flex: 1;
}

.screen.active {
  display: flex;
}

/* ===== ë©”ì¸ ë©”ë‰´ ===== */
.title-container {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: bounce-in 0.8s ease-out;
}

@keyframes bounce-in {
  0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.game-title {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

.title-super {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--warning);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

.title-quiz {

}

}

  50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
}

.subtitle {

}

/* ===== ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.menu-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.retro-btn {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.1s;
  position: relative;
  min-width: 280px;
}

.retro-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 4px;
  left: 4px;
  right: -4px;
  bottom: -4px;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  z-index: -1;
}

.retro-btn:hover {
  transform: translate(2px, 2px);
}

.retro-btn:hover::before {
  top: 2px;
  left: 2px;
  right: -2px;
  bottom: -2px;
}

.retro-btn:active {
  transform: translate(4px, 4px);
}

.retro-btn:active::before {
  display: none;
}

.retro-btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

.host-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #f472b6 0%, var(--secondary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #9d174d;
  border: 4px solid #9d174d;
}

.join-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #818cf8 0%, var(--primary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #3730a3;
  border: 4px solid #3730a3;
}

.start-btn, .start-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  color: #333;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.5);
  border: 4px solid #b45309;
}

.add-question-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #5eead4 0%, var(--accent) 100%);
  color: #0f172a;
  text-shadow: none;
  border: 4px solid #0f766e;
  font-size: 16px;
  padding: 15px 25px;
  flex: 1;
}

.join-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #a78bfa 0%, #8b5cf6 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #5b21b6;
  border: 4px solid #5b21b6;
}

.play-again-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fb923c 0%, #f97316 100%);

  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #c2410c;

}

.btn-icon {

}

.coin-counter {

}

@keyframes blink {

  50% { opacity: 0.5; }
}

}

  50% { transform: scaleX(0.1); }
}

/* ===== ë’¤ë¡œ ë²„íŠ¼ ===== */
.back-btn {

/* ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë¹Œë” ===== */

/* ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• ì˜µì…˜ ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.options-wrapper {

}

}

.option-input-group {

.option-input-group:nth-child(2) .option-input { border-color: var(--primary); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(3) .option-input { border-color: var(--warning); }

/* ===== í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ëŒ€ê¸°ì‹¤ ===== */
.room-code-display {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  animation: slide-down 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slide-down {
  from { transform: translateY(-50px); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.code-label {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;

.code-box {

}

}

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {
  text-align: center;

}

}

}

}

.loading-blocks {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;

}

.block {

}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }

}

.quiz-info, .participants-info {

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;
  background: var(--success) !important;
  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {
  animation: shake 0.5s ease-out;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* ===== OX í€´ì¦ˆ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.ox-select-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 15px 0;
}

.ox-option {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.ox-option input {
  display: none;
}

.ox-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 80px;
  height: 80px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);

}

.ox-label.ox-o {
  background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.1);
}

.ox-label.ox-x {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-o {
  background: var(--success);
  color: white;
  border-color: #15803d;
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-x {
  background: var(--danger);
  color: white;
  border-color: #b91c1c;
}

.ox-answer-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
}

.ox-btn {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 300px;
  font-size: 2rem !important;
  padding: 40px 20px !important;
}

.ox-o-btn {
  background: var(--success) !important;
}

.ox-x-btn {
  background: var(--danger) !important;
}

@keyframes correct-pulse {

  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); }
}

@keyframes shake {

.answer-status {

/* ===== ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ë‹µë³€ ===== */
```

```css
/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;

}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {

    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {

.loading-blocks {

}

.block {

}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.block:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }

}

.quiz-info, .participants-info {

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;

}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;

  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {

}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }

.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

}

.answer-btn.incorrect {

}
```

```css
/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;
  --font-pixel-en: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

/* ===== ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 16px;
  background: var(--bg-gradient);
  min-height: 100vh;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow-soft);
}

.game-container {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* ===== ë°°ê²½ ì¥ì‹ (ê¹”ë”í•œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) ===== */
.cloud, .ground, .pipe, .brick {
  display: none;
}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 75% 75%, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  z-index: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ê¸°ë³¸ ===== */
.screen {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 80px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
  flex: 1;
}

.screen.active {
  display: flex;
}

/* ===== ë©”ì¸ ë©”ë‰´ ===== */
.title-container {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: bounce-in 0.8s ease-out;
}

@keyframes bounce-in {
  0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.game-title {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

.title-super {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--warning);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

.title-quiz {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  color: var(--secondary);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: pulse 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.title-bros {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--accent);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
}

.subtitle {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* ===== ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.menu-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.retro-btn {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.1s;
  position: relative;
  min-width: 280px;
}

.retro-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 4px;
  left: 4px;
  right: -4px;
  bottom: -4px;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  z-index: -1;
}

.retro-btn:hover {
  transform: translate(2px, 2px);
}

.retro-btn:hover::before {
  top: 2px;
  left: 2px;
  right: -2px;
  bottom: -2px;
}

.retro-btn:active {
  transform: translate(4px, 4px);
}

.retro-btn:active::before {
  display: none;
}

.retro-btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

.host-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #f472b6 0%, var(--secondary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #9d174d;
  border: 4px solid #9d174d;
}

.join-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #818cf8 0%, var(--primary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #3730a3;
  border: 4px solid #3730a3;
}

.start-btn, .start-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  color: #333;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.5);
  border: 4px solid #b45309;
}

.add-question-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #5eead4 0%, var(--accent) 100%);
  color: #0f172a;
  text-shadow: none;
  border: 4px solid #0f766e;
  font-size: 16px;
  padding: 15px 25px;
  flex: 1;
}

.join-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #a78bfa 0%, #8b5cf6 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #5b21b6;
  border: 4px solid #5b21b6;
}

.play-again-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fb923c 0%, #f97316 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #c2410c;
  border: 4px solid #c2410c;
  margin-top: 30px;
}

.btn-icon {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.coin-counter {

}

@keyframes blink {
  0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
  50% { opacity: 0.5; }
}

.coin {

}

.coin-text {
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

@keyframes spin-coin {
  0%, 100% { transform: scaleX(1); }
  50% { transform: scaleX(0.1); }
}

/* ===== ë’¤ë¡œ ë²„íŠ¼ ===== */
.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: 20px;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ì œëª© ===== */

/* ===== í¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.form-group {

/* ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë¹Œë” ===== */
.quiz-builder {

  padding: 20px;

  display: flex;

}

.quiz-builder .form-group {

}

.quiz-builder-buttons {

}

.questions-container {

.question-input {

}

/* ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• ì˜µì…˜ ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.options-wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 150px;
}

.options-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.option-input-group {

  gap: 8px;
}

}

}

.option-input:nth-child(1) { border-color: var(--danger); }

.option-input-group:nth-child(2) .option-input { border-color: var(--primary); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(3) .option-input { border-color: var(--warning); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(4) .option-input { border-color: var(--success); }

.time-select {

  padding: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;

}

/* ===== í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ëŒ€ê¸°ì‹¤ ===== */
.room-code-display {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  animation: slide-down 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slide-down {
  from { transform: translateY(-50px); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.code-label {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.code-box {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 2.5rem;

}

@keyframes glow {

  50% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 40px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.8); }

}

.participants-panel {

}

  font-size: 0.8rem;

}

}

  50% { transform: translateY(-5px); }
}

}

}

}

}

.participant-avatar {

}

}

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {
  text-align: center;
  animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.player-avatar {
  font-size: 5rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.waiting-message {

  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.loading-blocks {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.block {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: var(--primary);
  border: 4px solid var(--primary-dark);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;

  animation: block-bounce 0.6s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.block:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-15px); }
}

.quiz-info, .participants-info {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;

}

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;
  background: var(--success) !important;
  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {
  animation: shake 0.5s ease-out;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* ===== OX í€´ì¦ˆ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.ox-options,
.text-options,
.slider-options {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
}

.ox-select-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 15px 0;
}

.ox-option {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.ox-option input {
  display: none;
}

.ox-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 80px;
  height: 80px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  border: 4px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 10px;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.ox-label.ox-o {
  background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.1);
}

.ox-label.ox-x {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-o {
  background: var(--success);
  color: white;
  border-color: #15803d;
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-x {
  background: var(--danger);
  color: white;
  border-color: #b91c1c;
}

.ox-answer-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
}

.ox-btn {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 300px;
  font-size: 2rem !important;
  padding: 40px 20px !important;
}

.ox-o-btn {
  background: var(--success) !important;
}

.ox-x-btn {
  background: var(--danger) !important;
}

/* ===== ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */

  max-width: 600px;
  display: flex;

}

}

@keyframes correct-pulse {
  0% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); }
}

@keyframes shake {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }

  75% { transform: translateX(10px); }
}

.answer-status {
  margin-top: 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);

  border-radius: 5px;
}

/* ===== ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ë‹µë³€ ===== */
.slider-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 20px;
  background: white;
  border: 4px solid #333;

}

  background: var(--success);

/* ===== ì •ë‹µ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.answer-title {
```

```css
/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;

  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {

.block {

}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {

.question-box {

}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;

  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {

  gap: 15px;

  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {

}
```

```css
/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;
  --font-pixel-en: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

/* ===== ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 16px;
  background: var(--bg-gradient);
  min-height: 100vh;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow-soft);
}

.game-container {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* ===== ë°°ê²½ ì¥ì‹ (ê¹”ë”í•œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) ===== */
.cloud, .ground, .pipe, .brick {
  display: none;
}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 75% 75%, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  z-index: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ê¸°ë³¸ ===== */
.screen {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 80px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
  flex: 1;
}

.screen.active {
  display: flex;
}

/* ===== ë©”ì¸ ë©”ë‰´ ===== */
.title-container {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: bounce-in 0.8s ease-out;
}

@keyframes bounce-in {
  0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.game-title {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

.title-super {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--warning);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

.title-quiz {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  color: var(--secondary);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: pulse 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.title-bros {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--accent);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
}

.subtitle {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* ===== ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.menu-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.retro-btn {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.1s;
  position: relative;
  min-width: 280px;
}

.retro-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 4px;
  left: 4px;
  right: -4px;
  bottom: -4px;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  z-index: -1;
}

.retro-btn:hover {
  transform: translate(2px, 2px);
}

.retro-btn:hover::before {
  top: 2px;
  left: 2px;
  right: -2px;
  bottom: -2px;
}

.retro-btn:active {
  transform: translate(4px, 4px);
}

.retro-btn:active::before {
  display: none;
}

.retro-btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

.host-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #f472b6 0%, var(--secondary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #9d174d;
  border: 4px solid #9d174d;
}

.join-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #818cf8 0%, var(--primary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #3730a3;
  border: 4px solid #3730a3;
}

.start-btn, .start-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  color: #333;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.5);
  border: 4px solid #b45309;
}

.add-question-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #5eead4 0%, var(--accent) 100%);
  color: #0f172a;
  text-shadow: none;
  border: 4px solid #0f766e;
  font-size: 16px;
  padding: 15px 25px;
  flex: 1;
}

.join-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #a78bfa 0%, #8b5cf6 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #5b21b6;
  border: 4px solid #5b21b6;
}

.play-again-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fb923c 0%, #f97316 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #c2410c;
  border: 4px solid #c2410c;
  margin-top: 30px;
}

.btn-icon {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.coin-counter {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  color: var(--warning);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: blink 1s step-end infinite;
}

@keyframes blink {
  0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
  50% { opacity: 0.5; }
}

.coin {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  animation: spin-coin 2s linear infinite;
}

.coin-text {
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

@keyframes spin-coin {
  0%, 100% { transform: scaleX(1); }
  50% { transform: scaleX(0.1); }
}

/* ===== ë’¤ë¡œ ë²„íŠ¼ ===== */
.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: 20px;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  color: white;
  border: 3px solid white;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  z-index: 100;
}

.back-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ì œëª© ===== */
.screen-title {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);

  color: white;

  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
}

/* ===== í¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.form-group {

  max-width: 400px;
}

.pixel-label {
  display: block;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;

}

.pixel-input {

}

.pixel-input:focus {

}

.pixel-input.code-input {

/* ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë¹Œë” ===== */
.quiz-builder {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 20px;
  max-height: 70vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.quiz-builder .form-group {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.quiz-builder-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.quiz-builder-buttons .retro-btn {
  flex: 1;
  min-width: auto;
}

.questions-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin: 20px 0;
}

.question-card {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.95);
  border: 4px solid #333;

}

.question-header {

  justify-content: space-between;

}

.question-number {

}

.delete-question-btn {
  background: var(--danger);

  height: 30px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  cursor: pointer;

}

.delete-question-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.question-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.question-type-select {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  background: white;
}

/* ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• ì˜µì…˜ ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.options-wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 180px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .options-wrapper {
    min-height: 220px;
  }
}

.options-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.option-input-group {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
}

.option-radio {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.option-input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
}

.option-input:nth-child(1) { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(1) .option-input { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(2) .option-input { border-color: var(--primary); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(3) .option-input { border-color: var(--warning); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(4) .option-input { border-color: var(--success); }

.time-select {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  background: white;
}

/* ===== í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ëŒ€ê¸°ì‹¤ ===== */
.room-code-display {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  animation: slide-down 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slide-down {
  from { transform: translateY(-50px); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.code-label {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.code-box {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  color: #1e1b4b;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 10px;
  animation: glow 2s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes glow {
  0%, 100% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 20px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.5); }
  50% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 40px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.8); }
}

.code-hint {
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 15px;
}

.participants-panel {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  border: 4px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
  border-radius: 10px;
  padding: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.participants-header {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.mushroom {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  animation: bounce 0.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-5px); }
}

.participants-list {
  min-height: 100px;
  max-height: 200px;
  overflow-y: auto;
}

.waiting-text {
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.participant-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  padding: 10px;

  margin-bottom: 8px;

  animation: pop-in 0.3s ease-out;
}

@keyframes pop-in {
  from { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.participant-avatar {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.participant-name {
  color: white;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {
  text-align: center;
  animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.player-avatar {
  font-size: 5rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.player-name {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.waiting-message {
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.8);
  font-size: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.loading-blocks {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.block {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: var(--primary);
  border: 4px solid var(--primary-dark);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: block-bounce 0.6s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.block:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-15px); }
}

.quiz-info, .participants-info {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;
  background: var(--success) !important;
  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {
  animation: shake 0.5s ease-out;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* ===== OX í€´ì¦ˆ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.ox-options,
.text-options,
.slider-options {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
}

.ox-select-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 15px 0;
}

.ox-option {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.ox-option input {
  display: none;
}

.ox-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 100px;
  height: 60px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  border: 4px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 10px;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.ox-label.ox-o {
  background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.1);
}

.ox-label.ox-x {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-o {
  background: var(--success);
  color: white;
  border-color: #15803d;
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-x {
  background: var(--danger);
  color: white;
  border-color: #b91c1c;
}

.ox-answer-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
}

.ox-btn {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 300px;
  font-size: 2rem !important;
  padding: 40px 20px !important;
}

.ox-o-btn {
  background: var(--success) !important;
}

.ox-x-btn {
  background: var(--danger) !important;
}

/* ===== ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.text-answer-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 20px;
}

.text-answer-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 20px;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);

}

.text-answer-input:focus {

}

.submit-text-btn {
  background: var(--primary) !important;
  color: white !important;
  border-color: var(--primary-dark) !important;
  padding: 15px 50px !important;
}

@keyframes correct-pulse {
  0% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); }
}

@keyframes shake {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
  25% { transform: translateX(-10px); }
  75% { transform: translateX(10px); }
}

.answer-status {
  margin-top: 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

/* ===== ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ë‹µë³€ ===== */
.slider-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 20px;
  background: white;
  border: 4px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

.submit-slider-btn {

  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  background: var(--success);

/* ===== ì •ë‹µ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.answer-title {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;

  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 30px;

}

.leaderboard-mini {

.leaderboard-name {
```

```css
/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
```
