```css
/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;
  --font-pixel-en: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

/* ===== ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 16px;
  background: var(--bg-gradient);
  min-height: 100vh;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow-soft);
}

.game-container {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* ===== ë°°ê²½ ì¥ì‹ (ê¹”ë”í•œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) ===== */
.cloud, .ground, .pipe, .brick {
  display: none;
}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 75% 75%, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  z-index: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ê¸°ë³¸ ===== */
.screen {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 80px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
  flex: 1;
}

.screen.active {
  display: flex;
}

/* ===== ë©”ì¸ ë©”ë‰´ ===== */
.title-container {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: bounce-in 0.8s ease-out;
}

@keyframes bounce-in {
  0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.game-title {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

.title-super {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--warning);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

.title-quiz {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  color: var(--secondary);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: pulse 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.title-bros {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--accent);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
}

.subtitle {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* ===== ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.menu-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.retro-btn {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.1s;
  position: relative;
  min-width: 280px;
}

.retro-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 4px;
  left: 4px;
  right: -4px;
  bottom: -4px;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  z-index: -1;
}

.retro-btn:hover {
  transform: translate(2px, 2px);
}

.retro-btn:hover::before {
  top: 2px;
  left: 2px;
  right: -2px;
  bottom: -2px;
}

.retro-btn:active {
  transform: translate(4px, 4px);
}

.retro-btn:active::before {
  display: none;
}

.retro-btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

.host-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #f472b6 0%, var(--secondary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #9d174d;
  border: 4px solid #9d174d;
}

.join-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #818cf8 0%, var(--primary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #3730a3;
  border: 4px solid #3730a3;
}

.start-btn, .start-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  color: #333;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.5);
  border: 4px solid #b45309;
}

.add-question-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #5eead4 0%, var(--accent) 100%);
  color: #0f172a;
  text-shadow: none;
  border: 4px solid #0f766e;
  font-size: 16px;
  padding: 15px 25px;
  flex: 1;
}

.join-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #a78bfa 0%, #8b5cf6 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #5b21b6;
  border: 4px solid #5b21b6;
}

.play-again-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fb923c 0%, #f97316 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #c2410c;
  border: 4px solid #c2410c;
  margin-top: 30px;
}

.btn-icon {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.coin-counter {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  color: var(--warning);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: blink 1s step-end infinite;
}

@keyframes blink {
  0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
  50% { opacity: 0.5; }
}

.coin {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  animation: spin-coin 2s linear infinite;
}

.coin-text {
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

@keyframes spin-coin {
  0%, 100% { transform: scaleX(1); }
  50% { transform: scaleX(0.1); }
}

/* ===== ë’¤ë¡œ ë²„íŠ¼ ===== */
.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: 20px;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  color: white;
  border: 3px solid white;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  z-index: 100;
}

.back-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ì œëª© ===== */
.screen-title {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
}

/* ===== í¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
}

.pixel-label {
  display: block;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.pixel-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 15px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  background: #fff;
  border: 4px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  outline: none;
}

.pixel-input:focus {
  border-color: var(--mario-yellow);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(251, 208, 0, 0.3), var(--box-shadow);
}

.pixel-input.code-input {
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 5px;
  text-align: center;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

/* ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë¹Œë” ===== */
.quiz-builder {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 20px;
  max-height: 70vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.quiz-builder .form-group {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.quiz-builder-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.quiz-builder-buttons .retro-btn {
  flex: 1;
  min-width: auto;
}

.questions-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin: 20px 0;
}

.question-card {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.95);
  border: 4px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 20px;
  position: relative;
}

.question-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  padding-bottom: 10px;
  border-bottom: 3px dashed #ccc;
}

.question-number {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--secondary);
}

.delete-question-btn {
  background: var(--danger);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  width: 30px;
  height: 30px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform 0.2s;
}

.delete-question-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.question-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.question-type-select {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  background: white;
}

/* ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• ì˜µì…˜ ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.options-wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 160px;
  max-height: 160px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  overflow: hidden;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .options-wrapper {
    min-height: 320px;
    max-height: 320px;
  }
}

.options-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.option-input-group {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 5px;
}

.option-radio {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  cursor: pointer;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.option-input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 6px 8px;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 13px;
  border: 2px solid #ddd;
  min-width: 0;
}

.option-input:nth-child(1) { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(1) .option-input { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(2) .option-input { border-color: var(--primary); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(3) .option-input { border-color: var(--warning); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(4) .option-input { border-color: var(--success); }

.time-select {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  background: white;
}

/* ===== í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ëŒ€ê¸°ì‹¤ ===== */
.room-code-display {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  animation: slide-down 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slide-down {
  from { transform: translateY(-50px); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.code-label {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.code-box {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  color: #1e1b4b;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 10px;
  animation: glow 2s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes glow {
  0%, 100% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 20px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.5); }
  50% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 40px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.8); }
}

.code-hint {
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 15px;
}

.participants-panel {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  border: 4px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
  border-radius: 10px;
  padding: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.participants-header {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.mushroom {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  animation: bounce 0.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-5px); }
}

.participants-list {
  min-height: 100px;
  max-height: 200px;
  overflow-y: auto;
}

.waiting-text {
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.participant-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  padding: 10px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  animation: pop-in 0.3s ease-out;
}

@keyframes pop-in {
  from { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.participant-avatar {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.participant-name {
  color: white;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {
  text-align: center;
  animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.player-avatar {
  font-size: 5rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.player-name {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.waiting-message {
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.8);
  font-size: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.loading-blocks {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.block {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: var(--primary);
  border: 4px solid var(--primary-dark);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: block-bounce 0.6s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.block:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-15px); }
}

.quiz-info, .participants-info {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;
  background: var(--success) !important;
  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {
  animation: shake 0.5s ease-out;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* ===== OX í€´ì¦ˆ, ì£¼ê´€ì‹, ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.ox-options,
.text-options,
.slider-options {
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: stretch;
}

.slider-options .form-group,
.text-options .form-group {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.ox-select-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 15px 0;
}

.ox-option {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.ox-option input {
  display: none;
}

.ox-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 100px;
  height: 60px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  border: 4px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 10px;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.ox-label.ox-o {
  background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.1);
}

.ox-label.ox-x {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-o {
  background: var(--success);
  color: white;
  border-color: #15803d;
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-x {
  background: var(--danger);
  color: white;
  border-color: #b91c1c;
}

.ox-answer-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
}

.ox-btn {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 300px;
  font-size: 2rem !important;
  padding: 40px 20px !important;
}

.ox-o-btn {
  background: var(--success) !important;
}

.ox-x-btn {
  background: var(--danger) !important;
}

/* ===== ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.text-answer-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 20px;
}

.text-answer-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 20px;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  text-align: center;
  border: 4px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  outline: none;
}

.text-answer-input:focus {
  border-color: var(--primary);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3), var(--box-shadow);
}

.submit-text-btn {
  background: var(--primary) !important;
  color: white !important;
  border-color: var(--primary-dark) !important;
  padding: 15px 50px !important;

@keyframes correct-pulse {

function showToast(message, icon = 'â„¹ï¸') {

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ ì¶”ê°€ =====
function addQuestion() {

  questionCard.innerHTML = `

      </div>
      <p style="font-size: 0.8rem; color: #666; margin-top: 10px;">âœ“ ì •ë‹µì„ ì„ íƒí•˜ì„¸ìš”</p>
    </div>
    
    <div class="options-wrapper text-options" data-type="text" style="display: none;">
      <div class="form-group">
        <label class="pixel-label" style="color: #333; text-shadow: none;">ì •ë‹µ (ëŒ€ì†Œë¬¸ì êµ¬ë¶„ ì—†ìŒ)</label>
        <input type="text" class="question-input" data-field="textAnswer" placeholder="ì •ë‹µì„ ì…ë ¥í•˜ì„¸ìš”">
      </div>
      <p style="font-size: 0.8rem; color: #666; margin-top: 10px;">ğŸ’¡ ì°¸ê°€ìê°€ ì…ë ¥í•œ ë‹µê³¼ ë¹„êµí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤</p>
    </div>
    
    <div class="options-wrapper slider-options" data-type="slider" style="display: none;">
      <div class="form-group">

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ ì‚­ì œ =====
function deleteQuestion(btn) {
  const card = btn.closest('.question-card');
  card.remove();
  
  // ë¬¸ì œ ë²ˆí˜¸ ë‹¤ì‹œ ë§¤ê¸°ê¸°
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.question-card');
  cards.forEach((card, index) => {
    card.querySelector('.question-number').textContent = `ë¬¸ì œ ${index + 1}`;
  });
}

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• í† ê¸€ =====
function toggleQuestionType(select) {
  const card = select.closest('.question-card');
  const multipleOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="multiple"]');
  const oxOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="ox"]');
  const textOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="text"]');
  const sliderOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="slider"]');
  
  // ëª¨ë“  ì˜µì…˜ ìˆ¨ê¸°ê¸°
  multipleOptions.style.display = 'none';
  oxOptions.style.display = 'none';
  textOptions.style.display = 'none';
  sliderOptions.style.display = 'none';
  
  // ì„ íƒëœ ìœ í˜•ë§Œ í‘œì‹œ
  switch (select.value) {
    case 'multiple':
      multipleOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'ox':
      oxOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'text':
      textOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'slider':
      sliderOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
  }
}

// ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë°ì´í„° ìˆ˜ì§‘ =====
function collectQuizData() {
  const title = document.getElementById('quiz-title').value.trim();
  
  if (!title) {
    showToast('í€´ì¦ˆ ì œëª©ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return null;
  }
  
  const questionCards = document.querySelectorAll('.question-card');
  
  if (questionCards.length === 0) {
    showToast('ìµœì†Œ 1ê°œ ì´ìƒì˜ ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return null;
  }
  
  const questions = [];
  
  for (const card of questionCards) {
    const questionText = card.querySelector('[data-field="question"]').value.trim();
    const type = card.querySelector('[data-field="type"]').value;
    const timeLimit = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="timeLimit"]').value);
    
    if (!questionText) {
      showToast('ëª¨ë“  ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
      return null;
    }
    
    const questionData = {
      question: questionText,
      type,
      timeLimit
    };
    
    if (type === 'multiple') {
      const options = [];
      const optionInputs = card.querySelectorAll('[data-option]');
      
      for (const input of optionInputs) {
        const optionText = input.value.trim();
        if (!optionText) {
          showToast('ëª¨ë“  ë³´ê¸°ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
          return null;
        }
        options.push(optionText);
      }
      
      questionData.options = options;
      questionData.correctAnswer = parseInt(card.querySelector('.option-radio:checked').value);
    } else if (type === 'ox') {
      questionData.options = ['O', 'X'];
      questionData.correctAnswer = card.querySelector('.ox-radio:checked').value;
    } else if (type === 'text') {
      const textAnswer = card.querySelector('[data-field="textAnswer"]').value.trim();
      if (!textAnswer) {
        showToast('ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ì •ë‹µì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
        return null;
      }
      questionData.options = null;
      questionData.correctAnswer = textAnswer;
    } else if (type === 'slider') {
      const min = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="min"]').value);
      const max = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="max"]').value);
      const answer = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="sliderAnswer"]').value);
      
      questionData.options = { min, max };
      questionData.correctAnswer = answer;
    }
    
    questions.push(questionData);
  }
  
  return { title, questions };
}

// ===== ë°© ìƒì„± =====
function createRoom() {
  const quizData = collectQuizData();
  
  if (!quizData) return;
  
  const btn = document.getElementById('create-room-btn');
  btn.disabled = true;
  btn.querySelector('.btn-text').textContent = 'ìƒì„± ì¤‘...';
  
  socket.emit('create-room', quizData, (response) => {
    btn.disabled = false;
    btn.querySelector('.btn-text').textContent = 'ë°© ë§Œë“¤ê¸°';
    
    if (response.success) {
      currentRoomCode = response.roomCode;
      isHost = true;
      
      document.getElementById('room-code-display').textContent = response.roomCode;
      showScreen('host-lobby');
      showToast('ë°©ì´ ìƒì„±ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'ğŸ‰');
    } else {

// ===== ë°© ì°¸ê°€ =====
function joinRoom() {
  const nickname = document.getElementById('nickname').value.trim();
  const roomCode = document.getElementById('room-code-input').value.trim().toUpperCase();
  
  if (!nickname) {
    showToast('ë‹‰ë„¤ì„ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  if (!roomCode || roomCode.length !== 6) {
    showToast('6ìë¦¬ ì°¸ê°€ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  socket.emit('join-room', { roomCode, nickname }, (response) => {
    if (response.success) {
      currentRoomCode = roomCode;
      isHost = false;
      
      document.getElementById('player-nickname').textContent = nickname;
      document.getElementById('quiz-title-display').textContent = response.quizTitle;
      document.getElementById('player-count-display').textContent = response.participantCount;
      
      showScreen('player-lobby');
      showToast(`${response.quizTitle}ì— ì°¸ê°€í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!`, 'ğŸ®');
    } else {
      showToast(response.message, 'âŒ');
    }
  });
}

// ===== ê²Œì„ ì‹œì‘ (í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸) =====
function startGame() {
  if (!currentRoomCode || !isHost) return;
  
  socket.emit('start-game', currentRoomCode);
}

// ===== ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitAnswer(answerIndex) {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  
  // ì„ íƒí•œ ë²„íŠ¼ í‘œì‹œ
  const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.answer-btn');
  buttons.forEach((btn, index) => {
    if (index === answerIndex) {
      btn.classList.add('selected');
    }
    btn.disabled = true;
  });
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {
    roomCode: currentRoomCode,
    questionIndex: currentQuestion.index,
    answer: answerIndex,
    timeRemaining
  });
  
  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitSliderAnswer() {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  
  const slider = document.querySelector('.slider-input');
  const value = parseInt(slider.value);
  
  document.querySelector('.submit-slider-btn').disabled = true;
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {
    roomCode: currentRoomCode,
    questionIndex: currentQuestion.index,
    answer: value,
    timeRemaining
  });
  
  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitTextAnswer() {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  const input = document.getElementById('text-answer-input');
  const answer = input.value.trim();
  
  if (!answer) {
    showToast('ë‹µë³€ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  input.disabled = true;
  document.querySelector('.submit-text-btn').disabled = true;
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {
    roomCode: currentRoomCode,
    questionIndex: currentQuestion.index,
    answer: answer,
    timeRemaining
  });
  
  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ ì‹œì‘ =====
function startTimer(duration) {
  timeRemaining = duration;
  
  const timerBar = document.getElementById('timer-bar');
  const timerText = document.getElementById('timer-text');
  
  timerBar.style.width = '100%';
  timerText.textContent = duration;
  
  if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
  
  timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
    timeRemaining--;
    
    const percentage = (timeRemaining / duration) * 100;
    timerBar.style.width = `${percentage}%`;
    timerText.textContent = timeRemaining;
    
    if (timeRemaining <= 0) {
      clearInterval(timerInterval);
    }
  }, 1000);
}

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayQuestion(questionData) {
  currentQuestion = questionData;
  hasAnswered = false;
  
  document.getElementById('current-q').textContent = questionData.index + 1;
  document.getElementById('total-q').textContent = questionData.total;

    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(oxContainer);
  } else if (questionData.type === 'text') {

    textContainer.className = 'text-answer-container';

      <button class="submit-text-btn retro-btn" onclick="submitTextAnswer()">ì œì¶œí•˜ê¸°</button>
    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(textContainer);
    
    // ì—”í„°í‚¤ë¡œ ì œì¶œ
    setTimeout(() => {

  } else if (questionData.type === 'slider') {

    sliderContainer.className = 'slider-container';
    sliderContainer.innerHTML = `

      <input type="range" class="slider-input" 
        min="${questionData.options.min}" 
        max="${questionData.options.max}" 
        value="${Math.round((questionData.options.min + questionData.options.max) / 2)}"
        oninput="document.getElementById('slider-value').textContent = this.value">
      <div class="slider-labels">
        <span>${questionData.options.min}</span>
        <span>${questionData.options.max}</span>
      </div>
      <button class="submit-slider-btn retro-btn" onclick="submitSliderAnswer()">ì œì¶œí•˜ê¸°</button>
    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(sliderContainer);
  }
  
  // ë‹µë³€ í˜„í™© ì´ˆê¸°í™”
  document.getElementById('answered-count').textContent = '0';
  
  showScreen('game-screen');
  startTimer(questionData.timeLimit);
}

// ===== ì •ë‹µ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayAnswer(data) {
  if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
  
  const title = document.getElementById('answer-result-title');
  const correctAnswerEl = document.getElementById('correct-answer');
  
  // í˜„ì¬ ì‚¬ìš©ìì˜ ê²°ê³¼ ì°¾ê¸°
  const myResult = data.results.find(r => r.id === socket.id);
  
  if (isHost) {

    title.className = 'answer-title';
  } else if (myResult) {
    if (myResult.isCorrect) {
      title.textContent = 'ì •ë‹µ! ğŸ‰';

  // ì •ë‹µ í‘œì‹œ

  } else {

  `).join('');

}

// ===== ìµœì¢… ê²°ê³¼ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayFinalResults(data) {
  const results = data.results;
  
  // ì‹œìƒëŒ€ í‘œì‹œ
  const places = ['place-1', 'place-2', 'place-3'];

}

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ ì‚­ì œ =====
function deleteQuestion(btn) {
  const card = btn.closest('.question-card');
  card.remove();

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• í† ê¸€ =====
function toggleQuestionType(select) {
  const card = select.closest('.question-card');
  const multipleOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="multiple"]');
  const oxOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="ox"]');
  const textOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="text"]');
  const sliderOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="slider"]');
  
  // ëª¨ë“  ì˜µì…˜ ìˆ¨ê¸°ê¸°
  multipleOptions.style.display = 'none';
  oxOptions.style.display = 'none';
  textOptions.style.display = 'none';
  sliderOptions.style.display = 'none';
  
  // ì„ íƒëœ ìœ í˜•ë§Œ í‘œì‹œ
  switch (select.value) {
    case 'multiple':
      multipleOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'ox':
      oxOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'text':
      textOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'slider':
      sliderOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
  }
}

function collectQuizData() {

  if (!title) {
    showToast('í€´ì¦ˆ ì œëª©ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');

  if (questionCards.length === 0) {

    return null;
  }
  
  const questions = [];
  
  for (const card of questionCards) {
    const questionText = card.querySelector('[data-field="question"]').value.trim();
    const type = card.querySelector('[data-field="type"]').value;
    const timeLimit = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="timeLimit"]').value);
    
    if (!questionText) {
      showToast('ëª¨ë“  ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
      return null;
    }
    
    const questionData = {
      question: questionText,
      type,
      timeLimit
    };
    
    if (type === 'multiple') {
      const options = [];
      const optionInputs = card.querySelectorAll('[data-option]');
      
      for (const input of optionInputs) {
        const optionText = input.value.trim();
        if (!optionText) {
          showToast('ëª¨ë“  ë³´ê¸°ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
          return null;
        }
        options.push(optionText);
      }
      
      questionData.options = options;
      questionData.correctAnswer = parseInt(card.querySelector('.option-radio:checked').value);
    } else if (type === 'ox') {
      questionData.options = ['O', 'X'];
      questionData.correctAnswer = card.querySelector('.ox-radio:checked').value;
    } else if (type === 'text') {
      const textAnswer = card.querySelector('[data-field="textAnswer"]').value.trim();
      if (!textAnswer) {
        showToast('ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ì •ë‹µì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
        return null;
      }
      questionData.options = null;
      questionData.correctAnswer = textAnswer;
    } else if (type === 'slider') {
      const min = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="min"]').value);
      const max = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="max"]').value);
      const answer = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="sliderAnswer"]').value);
      
      questionData.options = { min, max };
      questionData.correctAnswer = answer;
    }
    
    questions.push(questionData);
  }
  
  return { title, questions };
}

// ===== ë°© ìƒì„± =====
function createRoom() {
  const quizData = collectQuizData();
  
  if (!quizData) return;
  
  const btn = document.getElementById('create-room-btn');
  btn.disabled = true;
  btn.querySelector('.btn-text').textContent = 'ìƒì„± ì¤‘...';
  
  socket.emit('create-room', quizData, (response) => {
    btn.disabled = false;
    btn.querySelector('.btn-text').textContent = 'ë°© ë§Œë“¤ê¸°';
    
    if (response.success) {
      currentRoomCode = response.roomCode;
      isHost = true;
      
      document.getElementById('room-code-display').textContent = response.roomCode;
      showScreen('host-lobby');
      showToast('ë°©ì´ ìƒì„±ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'ğŸ‰');
    } else {
      showToast('ë°© ìƒì„±ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.', 'âŒ');
    }
  });
}

// ===== ë°© ì°¸ê°€ =====
function joinRoom() {
  const nickname = document.getElementById('nickname').value.trim();
  const roomCode = document.getElementById('room-code-input').value.trim().toUpperCase();
  
  if (!nickname) {
    showToast('ë‹‰ë„¤ì„ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  if (!roomCode || roomCode.length !== 6) {
    showToast('6ìë¦¬ ì°¸ê°€ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  socket.emit('join-room', { roomCode, nickname }, (response) => {
    if (response.success) {
      currentRoomCode = roomCode;
      isHost = false;
      
      document.getElementById('player-nickname').textContent = nickname;
      document.getElementById('quiz-title-display').textContent = response.quizTitle;
      document.getElementById('player-count-display').textContent = response.participantCount;
      
      showScreen('player-lobby');
      showToast(`${response.quizTitle}ì— ì°¸ê°€í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!`, 'ğŸ®');
    } else {
      showToast(response.message, 'âŒ');
    }
  });
}

// ===== ê²Œì„ ì‹œì‘ (í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸) =====
function startGame() {
  if (!currentRoomCode || !isHost) return;
  
  socket.emit('start-game', currentRoomCode);
}

// ===== ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitAnswer(answerIndex) {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  
  // ì„ íƒí•œ ë²„íŠ¼ í‘œì‹œ
  const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.answer-btn');
  buttons.forEach((btn, index) => {
    if (index === answerIndex) {
      btn.classList.add('selected');
    }
    btn.disabled = true;
  });
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {
    roomCode: currentRoomCode,
    questionIndex: currentQuestion.index,
    answer: answerIndex,
    timeRemaining
  });
  
  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitSliderAnswer() {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  
  const slider = document.querySelector('.slider-input');
  const value = parseInt(slider.value);
  
  document.querySelector('.submit-slider-btn').disabled = true;
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {
    roomCode: currentRoomCode,
    questionIndex: currentQuestion.index,
    answer: value,

  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitTextAnswer() {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  const input = document.getElementById('text-answer-input');
  const answer = input.value.trim();
  
  if (!answer) {
    showToast('ë‹µë³€ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  input.disabled = true;
  document.querySelector('.submit-text-btn').disabled = true;
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {

    answer: answer,

  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ ì‹œì‘ =====
function startTimer(duration) {
  timeRemaining = duration;
  
  const timerBar = document.getElementById('timer-bar');
  const timerText = document.getElementById('timer-text');
  
  timerBar.style.width = '100%';
  timerText.textContent = duration;
  
  if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
  
  timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
    timeRemaining--;
    
    const percentage = (timeRemaining / duration) * 100;
    timerBar.style.width = `${percentage}%`;
    timerText.textContent = timeRemaining;
    
    if (timeRemaining <= 0) {
      clearInterval(timerInterval);
    }
  }, 1000);
}

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayQuestion(questionData) {
  currentQuestion = questionData;
  hasAnswered = false;
  
  document.getElementById('current-q').textContent = questionData.index + 1;
  document.getElementById('total-q').textContent = questionData.total;
  document.getElementById('question-text').textContent = questionData.question;
  
  const answersContainer = document.getElementById('answers-container');
  answersContainer.innerHTML = '';
  
  if (questionData.type === 'multiple') {
    questionData.options.forEach((option, index) => {

      btn.className = 'answer-btn';
      btn.textContent = option;
      btn.onclick = () => submitAnswer(index);
      answersContainer.appendChild(btn);
    });
  } else if (questionData.type === 'ox') {
    // OX í€´ì¦ˆ
    const oxContainer = document.createElement('div');
    oxContainer.className = 'ox-answer-container';
    oxContainer.innerHTML = `
      <button class="answer-btn ox-btn ox-o-btn" onclick="submitAnswer('O')">â­• O</button>
      <button class="answer-btn ox-btn ox-x-btn" onclick="submitAnswer('X')">âŒ X</button>
    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(oxContainer);
  } else if (questionData.type === 'text') {
    // ì£¼ê´€ì‹
    const textContainer = document.createElement('div');
    textContainer.className = 'text-answer-container';
    textContainer.innerHTML = `
      <input type="text" class="text-answer-input" id="text-answer-input" placeholder="ì •ë‹µì„ ì…ë ¥í•˜ì„¸ìš”" autocomplete="off">
      <button class="submit-text-btn retro-btn" onclick="submitTextAnswer()">ì œì¶œí•˜ê¸°</button>
    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(textContainer);
    
    // ì—”í„°í‚¤ë¡œ ì œì¶œ
    setTimeout(() => {
      const input = document.getElementById('text-answer-input');
      input.focus();
      input.addEventListener('keypress', (e) => {
        if (e.key === 'Enter') submitTextAnswer();
      });
    }, 100);
  } else if (questionData.type === 'slider') {
    // ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” íƒ€ì…
    const sliderContainer = document.createElement('div');
    sliderContainer.className = 'slider-container';
    sliderContainer.innerHTML = `
      <div class="slider-value" id="slider-value">${Math.round((questionData.options.min + questionData.options.max) / 2)}</div>
      <input type="range" class="slider-input" 
        min="${questionData.options.min}" 
        max="${questionData.options.max}" 
        value="${Math.round((questionData.options.min + questionData.options.max) / 2)}"
        oninput="document.getElementById('slider-value').textContent = this.value">
      <div class="slider-labels">
        <span>${questionData.options.min}</span>
        <span>${questionData.options.max}</span>
      </div>
      <button class="submit-slider-btn retro-btn" onclick="submitSliderAnswer()">ì œì¶œí•˜ê¸°</button>
    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(sliderContainer);
  }
  
  // ë‹µë³€ í˜„í™© ì´ˆê¸°í™”
  document.getElementById('answered-count').textContent = '0';
  
  showScreen('game-screen');
  startTimer(questionData.timeLimit);
}

// ===== ì •ë‹µ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayAnswer(data) {
  if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
  
  const title = document.getElementById('answer-result-title');
  const correctAnswerEl = document.getElementById('correct-answer');
  
  // í˜„ì¬ ì‚¬ìš©ìì˜ ê²°ê³¼ ì°¾ê¸°
  const myResult = data.results.find(r => r.id === socket.id);
  
  if (isHost) {
    title.textContent = 'ì •ë‹µ ê³µê°œ!';
    title.className = 'answer-title';
  } else if (myResult) {
    if (myResult.isCorrect) {
      title.textContent = 'ì •ë‹µ! ğŸ‰';
      title.className = 'answer-title correct';
    } else {
      title.textContent = 'ì˜¤ë‹µ... ğŸ˜¢';
      title.className = 'answer-title incorrect';
    }
  }
  
  // ì •ë‹µ í‘œì‹œ
  if (currentQuestion.type === 'multiple') {
    correctAnswerEl.textContent = currentQuestion.options[data.correctAnswer];
  } else if (currentQuestion.type === 'ox') {
    correctAnswerEl.textContent = data.correctAnswer === 'O' ? 'â­• O' : 'âŒ X';
  } else {
    correctAnswerEl.textContent = data.correctAnswer;
  }
  
  // ìˆœìœ„í‘œ í‘œì‹œ
  const leaderboard = document.getElementById('leaderboard-mini');
  leaderboard.innerHTML = data.results.slice(0, 5).map((result, index) => `
    <div class="leaderboard-item">
      <span class="leaderboard-rank">${index + 1}.</span>
      <span class="leaderboard-name">${result.nickname}</span>
      <span class="leaderboard-score">${result.totalScore}ì </span>
      ${result.pointsEarned > 0 ? `<span class="leaderboard-points">+${result.pointsEarned}</span>` : ''}
    </div>
  `).join('');
  
  showScreen('answer-screen');
}

// ===== ìµœì¢… ê²°ê³¼ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayFinalResults(data) {
  const results = data.results;
  
  // ì‹œìƒëŒ€ í‘œì‹œ
  const places = ['place-1', 'place-2', 'place-3'];
  const podiumOrder = [1, 0, 2]; // 2ë“±, 1ë“±, 3ë“± ìˆœì„œ
  
  places.forEach((placeId, displayIndex) => {
    const place = document.getElementById(placeId);
    const resultIndex = podiumOrder[displayIndex];
    
    if (results[resultIndex]) {
      place.querySelector('.player-name').textContent = results[resultIndex].nickname;
      place.querySelector('.player-score').textContent = `${results[resultIndex].score}ì `;
      place.style.display = 'flex';
    } else {
      place.style.display = 'none';
    }
  });
  
  // ì „ì²´ ìˆœìœ„ í‘œì‹œ
  const fullResults = document.getElementById('full-results');
  fullResults.innerHTML = results.slice(3).map((result, index) => `
    <div class="result-item">
      <span class="result-rank">${index + 4}.</span>
      <span class="result-name">${result.nickname}</span>
      <span class="result-score">${result.score}ì </span>
    </div>
  `).join('');
  
  showScreen('results-screen');
}

  `;
  
  container.appendChild(questionCard);
  
  // ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ì´ë™
  questionCard.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'center' });
}

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ ì‚­ì œ =====
function deleteQuestion(btn) {
  const card = btn.closest('.question-card');
  card.remove();
  
  // ë¬¸ì œ ë²ˆí˜¸ ë‹¤ì‹œ ë§¤ê¸°ê¸°
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.question-card');
  cards.forEach((card, index) => {
    card.querySelector('.question-number').textContent = `ë¬¸ì œ ${index + 1}`;
  });
}

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• í† ê¸€ =====
function toggleQuestionType(select) {
  const card = select.closest('.question-card');
  const multipleOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="multiple"]');
  const oxOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="ox"]');
  const textOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="text"]');
  const sliderOptions = card.querySelector('[data-type="slider"]');
  
  // ëª¨ë“  ì˜µì…˜ ìˆ¨ê¸°ê¸°
  multipleOptions.style.display = 'none';
  oxOptions.style.display = 'none';
  textOptions.style.display = 'none';
  sliderOptions.style.display = 'none';
  
  // ì„ íƒëœ ìœ í˜•ë§Œ í‘œì‹œ
  switch (select.value) {
    case 'multiple':
      multipleOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'ox':
      oxOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'text':
      textOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
    case 'slider':
      sliderOptions.style.display = 'block';
      break;
  }
}

// ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë°ì´í„° ìˆ˜ì§‘ =====
function collectQuizData() {
  const title = document.getElementById('quiz-title').value.trim();
  
  if (!title) {
    showToast('í€´ì¦ˆ ì œëª©ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return null;
  }
  
  const questionCards = document.querySelectorAll('.question-card');
  
  if (questionCards.length === 0) {
    showToast('ìµœì†Œ 1ê°œ ì´ìƒì˜ ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return null;
  }
  
  const questions = [];
  
  for (const card of questionCards) {
    const questionText = card.querySelector('[data-field="question"]').value.trim();
    const type = card.querySelector('[data-field="type"]').value;
    const timeLimit = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="timeLimit"]').value);
    
    if (!questionText) {
      showToast('ëª¨ë“  ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
      return null;
    }
    
    const questionData = {
      question: questionText,
      type,
      timeLimit
    };
    
    if (type === 'multiple') {
      const options = [];
      const optionInputs = card.querySelectorAll('[data-option]');
      
      for (const input of optionInputs) {
        const optionText = input.value.trim();
        if (!optionText) {
          showToast('ëª¨ë“  ë³´ê¸°ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
          return null;
        }
        options.push(optionText);
      }
      
      questionData.options = options;
      questionData.correctAnswer = parseInt(card.querySelector('.option-radio:checked').value);
    } else if (type === 'ox') {
      questionData.options = ['O', 'X'];
      questionData.correctAnswer = card.querySelector('.ox-radio:checked').value;
    } else if (type === 'text') {
      const textAnswer = card.querySelector('[data-field="textAnswer"]').value.trim();
      if (!textAnswer) {
        showToast('ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ì •ë‹µì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
        return null;
      }
      questionData.options = null;
      questionData.correctAnswer = textAnswer;
    } else if (type === 'slider') {
      const min = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="min"]').value);
      const max = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="max"]').value);
      const answer = parseInt(card.querySelector('[data-field="sliderAnswer"]').value);
      
      questionData.options = { min, max };
      questionData.correctAnswer = answer;
    }
    
    questions.push(questionData);
  }
  
  return { title, questions };
}

// ===== ë°© ìƒì„± =====
function createRoom() {
  const quizData = collectQuizData();
  
  if (!quizData) return;
  
  const btn = document.getElementById('create-room-btn');
  btn.disabled = true;
  btn.querySelector('.btn-text').textContent = 'ìƒì„± ì¤‘...';
  
  socket.emit('create-room', quizData, (response) => {
    btn.disabled = false;
    btn.querySelector('.btn-text').textContent = 'ë°© ë§Œë“¤ê¸°';
    
    if (response.success) {
      currentRoomCode = response.roomCode;
      isHost = true;
      
      document.getElementById('room-code-display').textContent = response.roomCode;
      showScreen('host-lobby');
      showToast('ë°©ì´ ìƒì„±ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'ğŸ‰');
    } else {
      showToast('ë°© ìƒì„±ì— ì‹¤íŒ¨í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.', 'âŒ');
    }
  });
}

// ===== ë°© ì°¸ê°€ =====
function joinRoom() {
  const nickname = document.getElementById('nickname').value.trim();
  const roomCode = document.getElementById('room-code-input').value.trim().toUpperCase();
  
  if (!nickname) {
    showToast('ë‹‰ë„¤ì„ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  if (!roomCode || roomCode.length !== 6) {
    showToast('6ìë¦¬ ì°¸ê°€ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  socket.emit('join-room', { roomCode, nickname }, (response) => {
    if (response.success) {
      currentRoomCode = roomCode;
      isHost = false;
      
      document.getElementById('player-nickname').textContent = nickname;
      document.getElementById('quiz-title-display').textContent = response.quizTitle;
      document.getElementById('player-count-display').textContent = response.participantCount;
      
      showScreen('player-lobby');
      showToast(`${response.quizTitle}ì— ì°¸ê°€í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!`, 'ğŸ®');
    } else {
      showToast(response.message, 'âŒ');
    }
  });
}

// ===== ê²Œì„ ì‹œì‘ (í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸) =====
function startGame() {
  if (!currentRoomCode || !isHost) return;
  
  socket.emit('start-game', currentRoomCode);
}

// ===== ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitAnswer(answerIndex) {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  
  // ì„ íƒí•œ ë²„íŠ¼ í‘œì‹œ
  const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.answer-btn');
  buttons.forEach((btn, index) => {
    if (index === answerIndex) {
      btn.classList.add('selected');
    }
    btn.disabled = true;
  });
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {
    roomCode: currentRoomCode,
    questionIndex: currentQuestion.index,
    answer: answerIndex,
    timeRemaining
  });
  
  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitSliderAnswer() {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  
  const slider = document.querySelector('.slider-input');
  const value = parseInt(slider.value);
  
  document.querySelector('.submit-slider-btn').disabled = true;
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {
    roomCode: currentRoomCode,
    questionIndex: currentQuestion.index,
    answer: value,
    timeRemaining
  });
  
  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ë‹µë³€ ì œì¶œ =====
function submitTextAnswer() {
  if (hasAnswered || !currentQuestion) return;
  
  const input = document.getElementById('text-answer-input');
  const answer = input.value.trim();
  
  if (!answer) {
    showToast('ë‹µë³€ì„ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”!', 'âš ï¸');
    return;
  }
  
  hasAnswered = true;
  input.disabled = true;
  document.querySelector('.submit-text-btn').disabled = true;
  
  socket.emit('submit-answer', {
    roomCode: currentRoomCode,
    questionIndex: currentQuestion.index,
    answer: answer,
    timeRemaining
  });
  
  showToast('ë‹µë³€ì´ ì œì¶œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!', 'âœ…');
}

// ===== íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ ì‹œì‘ =====
function startTimer(duration) {
  timeRemaining = duration;
  
  const timerBar = document.getElementById('timer-bar');
  const timerText = document.getElementById('timer-text');
  
  timerBar.style.width = '100%';
  timerText.textContent = duration;
  
  if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
  
  timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
    timeRemaining--;
    
    const percentage = (timeRemaining / duration) * 100;
    timerBar.style.width = `${percentage}%`;
    timerText.textContent = timeRemaining;
    
    if (timeRemaining <= 0) {
      clearInterval(timerInterval);
    }
  }, 1000);
}

// ===== ë¬¸ì œ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayQuestion(questionData) {
  currentQuestion = questionData;
  hasAnswered = false;
  
  document.getElementById('current-q').textContent = questionData.index + 1;
  document.getElementById('total-q').textContent = questionData.total;
  document.getElementById('question-text').textContent = questionData.question;
  
  const answersContainer = document.getElementById('answers-container');
  answersContainer.innerHTML = '';
  
  if (questionData.type === 'multiple') {
    questionData.options.forEach((option, index) => {
      const btn = document.createElement('button');
      btn.className = 'answer-btn';
      btn.textContent = option;
      btn.onclick = () => submitAnswer(index);
      answersContainer.appendChild(btn);
    });
  } else if (questionData.type === 'ox') {
    // OX í€´ì¦ˆ
    const oxContainer = document.createElement('div');
    oxContainer.className = 'ox-answer-container';
    oxContainer.innerHTML = `
      <button class="answer-btn ox-btn ox-o-btn" onclick="submitAnswer('O')">â­• O</button>
      <button class="answer-btn ox-btn ox-x-btn" onclick="submitAnswer('X')">âŒ X</button>
    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(oxContainer);
  } else if (questionData.type === 'text') {
    // ì£¼ê´€ì‹
    const textContainer = document.createElement('div');
    textContainer.className = 'text-answer-container';
    textContainer.innerHTML = `
      <input type="text" class="text-answer-input" id="text-answer-input" placeholder="ì •ë‹µì„ ì…ë ¥í•˜ì„¸ìš”" autocomplete="off">
      <button class="submit-text-btn retro-btn" onclick="submitTextAnswer()">ì œì¶œí•˜ê¸°</button>
    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(textContainer);
    
    // ì—”í„°í‚¤ë¡œ ì œì¶œ
    setTimeout(() => {
      const input = document.getElementById('text-answer-input');
      input.focus();
      input.addEventListener('keypress', (e) => {
        if (e.key === 'Enter') submitTextAnswer();
      });
    }, 100);
  } else if (questionData.type === 'slider') {
    // ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” íƒ€ì…
    const sliderContainer = document.createElement('div');
    sliderContainer.className = 'slider-container';
    sliderContainer.innerHTML = `
      <div class="slider-value" id="slider-value">${Math.round((questionData.options.min + questionData.options.max) / 2)}</div>
      <input type="range" class="slider-input" 
        min="${questionData.options.min}" 
        max="${questionData.options.max}" 
        value="${Math.round((questionData.options.min + questionData.options.max) / 2)}"
        oninput="document.getElementById('slider-value').textContent = this.value">
      <div class="slider-labels">
        <span>${questionData.options.min}</span>
        <span>${questionData.options.max}</span>
      </div>
      <button class="submit-slider-btn retro-btn" onclick="submitSliderAnswer()">ì œì¶œí•˜ê¸°</button>
    `;
    answersContainer.appendChild(sliderContainer);
  }
  
  // ë‹µë³€ í˜„í™© ì´ˆê¸°í™”
  document.getElementById('answered-count').textContent = '0';
  
  showScreen('game-screen');
  startTimer(questionData.timeLimit);
}

// ===== ì •ë‹µ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayAnswer(data) {
  if (timerInterval) clearInterval(timerInterval);
  
  const title = document.getElementById('answer-result-title');
  const correctAnswerEl = document.getElementById('correct-answer');
  
  // í˜„ì¬ ì‚¬ìš©ìì˜ ê²°ê³¼ ì°¾ê¸°
  const myResult = data.results.find(r => r.id === socket.id);
  
  if (isHost) {
    title.textContent = 'ì •ë‹µ ê³µê°œ!';
    title.className = 'answer-title';
  } else if (myResult) {
    if (myResult.isCorrect) {
      title.textContent = 'ì •ë‹µ! ğŸ‰';
      title.className = 'answer-title correct';
    } else {
      title.textContent = 'ì˜¤ë‹µ... ğŸ˜¢';
      title.className = 'answer-title incorrect';
    }
  }
  
  // ì •ë‹µ í‘œì‹œ
  if (currentQuestion.type === 'multiple') {
    correctAnswerEl.textContent = currentQuestion.options[data.correctAnswer];
  } else if (currentQuestion.type === 'ox') {
    correctAnswerEl.textContent = data.correctAnswer === 'O' ? 'â­• O' : 'âŒ X';
  } else {
    correctAnswerEl.textContent = data.correctAnswer;
  }
  
  // ìˆœìœ„í‘œ í‘œì‹œ
  const leaderboard = document.getElementById('leaderboard-mini');
  leaderboard.innerHTML = data.results.slice(0, 5).map((result, index) => `
    <div class="leaderboard-item">
      <span class="leaderboard-rank">${index + 1}.</span>
      <span class="leaderboard-name">${result.nickname}</span>
      <span class="leaderboard-score">${result.totalScore}ì </span>
      ${result.pointsEarned > 0 ? `<span class="leaderboard-points">+${result.pointsEarned}</span>` : ''}
    </div>
  `).join('');
  
  showScreen('answer-screen');
}

// ===== ìµœì¢… ê²°ê³¼ í‘œì‹œ =====
function displayFinalResults(data) {
  const results = data.results;
  
  // ì‹œìƒëŒ€ í‘œì‹œ
  const places = ['place-1', 'place-2', 'place-3'];
  const podiumOrder = [1, 0, 2]; // 2ë“±, 1ë“±, 3ë“± ìˆœì„œ
  
  places.forEach((placeId, displayIndex) => {
    const place = document.getElementById(placeId);
    const resultIndex = podiumOrder[displayIndex];
    
    if (results[resultIndex]) {
      place.querySelector('.player-name').textContent = results[resultIndex].nickname;
      place.querySelector('.player-score').textContent = `${results[resultIndex].score}ì `;
      place.style.display = 'flex';
    } else {
      place.style.display = 'none';
    }
  });
  
  // ì „ì²´ ìˆœìœ„ í‘œì‹œ
  const fullResults = document.getElementById('full-results');
  fullResults.innerHTML = results.slice(3).map((result, index) => `
    <div class="result-item">
      <span class="result-rank">${index + 4}.</span>
      <span class="result-name">${result.nickname}</span>
      <span class="result-score">${result.score}ì </span>
    </div>
  `).join('');
  
  showScreen('results-screen');
}

/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;
  --font-pixel-en: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

/* ===== ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 16px;
  background: var(--bg-gradient);
  min-height: 100vh;

  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow-soft);
}

.game-container {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* ===== ë°°ê²½ ì¥ì‹ (ê¹”ë”í•œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) ===== */
.cloud, .ground, .pipe, .brick {
  display: none;
}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 75% 75%, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  z-index: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ê¸°ë³¸ ===== */
.screen {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding: 20px;

}

}

/* ===== ë©”ì¸ ë©”ë‰´ ===== */
.title-container {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: bounce-in 0.8s ease-out;
}

@keyframes bounce-in {
  0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }

  100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.game-title {

}

.title-super {

}

.title-quiz {
  font-size: 3.5rem;

}

  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--accent);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
}

.subtitle {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* ===== ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.menu-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.retro-btn {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.1s;
  position: relative;
  min-width: 280px;
}

.retro-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 4px;
  left: 4px;
  right: -4px;
  bottom: -4px;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  z-index: -1;
}

.retro-btn:hover {
  transform: translate(2px, 2px);
}

.retro-btn:hover::before {
  top: 2px;
  left: 2px;
  right: -2px;
  bottom: -2px;
}

.retro-btn:active {
  transform: translate(4px, 4px);
}

.retro-btn:active::before {
  display: none;
}

.retro-btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

.host-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #f472b6 0%, var(--secondary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #9d174d;
  border: 4px solid #9d174d;
}

.join-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #818cf8 0%, var(--primary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #3730a3;
  border: 4px solid #3730a3;
}

.start-btn, .start-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  color: #333;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.5);
  border: 4px solid #b45309;
}

.add-question-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #5eead4 0%, var(--accent) 100%);
  color: #0f172a;
  text-shadow: none;
  border: 4px solid #0f766e;
  font-size: 16px;
  padding: 15px 25px;
  flex: 1;
}

.join-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #a78bfa 0%, #8b5cf6 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #5b21b6;
  border: 4px solid #5b21b6;
}

.play-again-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fb923c 0%, #f97316 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #c2410c;
  border: 4px solid #c2410c;
  margin-top: 30px;
}

.btn-icon {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.coin-counter {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  color: var(--warning);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: blink 1s step-end infinite;
}

@keyframes blink {
  0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
  50% { opacity: 0.5; }
}

.coin {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  animation: spin-coin 2s linear infinite;
}

.coin-text {
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

@keyframes spin-coin {
  0%, 100% { transform: scaleX(1); }
  50% { transform: scaleX(0.1); }
}

/* ===== ë’¤ë¡œ ë²„íŠ¼ ===== */
.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: 20px;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  color: white;
  border: 3px solid white;

  z-index: 100;
}

.back-btn:hover {

}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ì œëª© ===== */
.screen-title {

}

/* ===== í¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.form-group {

  max-width: 400px;
}

.pixel-label {
  display: block;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;

.pixel-input {

/* ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë¹Œë” ===== */
.quiz-builder {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 20px;
  max-height: 70vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  display: flex;

}

.quiz-builder .form-group {

  max-width: 100%;
}

.quiz-builder-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  gap: 15px;

  margin-top: 20px;
}

.quiz-builder-buttons .retro-btn {
  flex: 1;

}

.questions-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;

}

.question-card {

}

}

}

.question-input {

.question-type-select {

/* ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• ì˜µì…˜ ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.options-wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 160px;
  max-height: 160px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  overflow: hidden;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .options-wrapper {
    min-height: 320px;
    max-height: 320px;
  }
}

.options-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.option-input-group {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 5px;
}

.option-radio {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  cursor: pointer;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.option-input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 6px 8px;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 13px;
  border: 2px solid #ddd;
  min-width: 0;
}

.option-input:nth-child(1) { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(1) .option-input { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(2) .option-input { border-color: var(--primary); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(3) .option-input { border-color: var(--warning); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(4) .option-input { border-color: var(--success); }

.time-select {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  background: white;
}

/* ===== í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ëŒ€ê¸°ì‹¤ ===== */
.room-code-display {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  animation: slide-down 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slide-down {
  from { transform: translateY(-50px); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.code-label {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.code-box {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  color: #1e1b4b;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 10px;
  animation: glow 2s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes glow {
  0%, 100% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 20px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.5); }
  50% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 40px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.8); }
}

.code-hint {

  color: white;

  margin-top: 15px;
}

.participants-panel {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  border: 4px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
  border-radius: 10px;
  padding: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.participants-header {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.mushroom {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  animation: bounce 0.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-5px); }
}

.participants-list {
  min-height: 100px;
  max-height: 200px;
  overflow-y: auto;
}

.waiting-text {

  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.participant-item {

}

@keyframes pop-in {
  from { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }

}

.participant-avatar {

}

.participant-name {
  color: white;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;

}

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {
  text-align: center;
  animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.player-avatar {
  font-size: 5rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.player-name {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;

  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.waiting-message {
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.8);
  font-size: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.loading-blocks {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.block {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: var(--primary);
  border: 4px solid var(--primary-dark);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: block-bounce 0.6s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.block:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-15px); }
}

.quiz-info, .participants-info {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;

}

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;
  background: var(--success) !important;
  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {
  animation: shake 0.5s ease-out;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* ===== OX í€´ì¦ˆ, ì£¼ê´€ì‹, ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.ox-options,
.text-options,
.slider-options {
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: stretch;
}

.slider-options .form-group,
.text-options .form-group {
  margin-bottom: 6px;
}

.slider-options .form-group .pixel-label,
.text-options .form-group .pixel-label {
  margin-bottom: 4px;
  font-size: 12px;
}

.slider-options .question-input,
.text-options .question-input {
  padding: 6px 10px;
  font-size: 14px;
}

.ox-select-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 15px 0;
}

.ox-option {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.ox-option input {
  display: none;
}

.ox-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 100px;
  height: 60px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  border: 4px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 10px;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.ox-label.ox-o {
  background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.1);
}

.ox-label.ox-x {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-o {
  background: var(--success);
  color: white;
  border-color: #15803d;
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-x {
  background: var(--danger);
  color: white;
  border-color: #b91c1c;
}

.ox-answer-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
}

.ox-btn {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 300px;
  font-size: 2rem !important;
  padding: 40px 20px !important;
}

.ox-o-btn {
  background: var(--success) !important;
}

.ox-x-btn {
  background: var(--danger) !important;
}

/* ===== ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */

  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 20px;
}

.text-answer-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 20px;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);

  border: 4px solid #333;

}

.text-answer-input:focus {

}

.submit-text-btn {
  background: var(--primary) !important;
  color: white !important;
  border-color: var(--primary-dark) !important;
  padding: 15px 50px !important;
}

@keyframes correct-pulse {
  0% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); }
}

@keyframes shake {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
  25% { transform: translateX(-10px); }
  75% { transform: translateX(10px); }
}

.answer-status {
  margin-top: 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

/* ===== ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ë‹µë³€ ===== */
.slider-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 20px;
  background: white;
  border: 4px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

}

}

}

.submit-slider-btn {
  margin-top: 20px;
  padding: 15px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  background: var(--success);
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid #15803d;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* ===== ì •ë‹µ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.answer-title {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: white;

  margin-bottom: 30px;

}

}

.correct-label {

```css
/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;
  --font-pixel-en: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

/* ===== ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
* {

body {

}

.game-container {

}

/* ===== ë°°ê²½ ì¥ì‹ (ê¹”ë”í•œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) ===== */
.cloud, .ground, .pipe, .brick {
  display: none;
}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {

  background-image: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ê¸°ë³¸ ===== */

/* ===== ë©”ì¸ ë©”ë‰´ ===== */

}

.game-title {

/* ===== ë’¤ë¡œ ë²„íŠ¼ ===== */
.back-btn {

/* ===== í¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */

.participants-header {

}

}

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {

.block {

@keyframes block-bounce {

}

.quiz-info, .participants-info {

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;
  background: var(--success) !important;
  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {
  animation: shake 0.5s ease-out;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* ===== OX í€´ì¦ˆ, ì£¼ê´€ì‹, ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
