```css
/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;
  --font-pixel-en: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

/* ===== ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 16px;
  background: var(--bg-gradient);
  min-height: 100vh;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow-soft);
}

.game-container {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* ===== ë°°ê²½ ì¥ì‹ (ê¹”ë”í•œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) ===== */
.cloud, .ground, .pipe, .brick {
  display: none;
}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 75% 75%, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  z-index: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ê¸°ë³¸ ===== */
.screen {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 80px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
  flex: 1;
}

.screen.active {
  display: flex;
}

/* ===== ë©”ì¸ ë©”ë‰´ ===== */
.title-container {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: bounce-in 0.8s ease-out;
}

@keyframes bounce-in {
  0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.game-title {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

.title-super {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--warning);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

.title-quiz {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  color: var(--secondary);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: pulse 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.title-bros {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--accent);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
}

.subtitle {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* ===== ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.menu-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.retro-btn {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.1s;
  position: relative;
  min-width: 280px;
}

.retro-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 4px;
  left: 4px;
  right: -4px;
  bottom: -4px;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  z-index: -1;
}

.retro-btn:hover {
  transform: translate(2px, 2px);
}

.retro-btn:hover::before {
  top: 2px;
  left: 2px;
  right: -2px;
  bottom: -2px;
}

.retro-btn:active {
  transform: translate(4px, 4px);
}

.retro-btn:active::before {
  display: none;
}

.retro-btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

.host-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #f472b6 0%, var(--secondary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #9d174d;
  border: 4px solid #9d174d;
}

.join-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #818cf8 0%, var(--primary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #3730a3;
  border: 4px solid #3730a3;
}

.start-btn, .start-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  color: #333;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.5);
  border: 4px solid #b45309;
}

.add-question-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #5eead4 0%, var(--accent) 100%);
  color: #0f172a;
  text-shadow: none;
  border: 4px solid #0f766e;
  font-size: 16px;
  padding: 15px 25px;
  flex: 1;
}

.join-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #a78bfa 0%, #8b5cf6 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #5b21b6;
  border: 4px solid #5b21b6;
}

.play-again-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fb923c 0%, #f97316 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #c2410c;
  border: 4px solid #c2410c;
  margin-top: 30px;
}

.btn-icon {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.coin-counter {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  color: var(--warning);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  animation: blink 1s step-end infinite;
}

@keyframes blink {
  0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
  50% { opacity: 0.5; }
}

.coin {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  animation: spin-coin 2s linear infinite;
}

.coin-text {
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

@keyframes spin-coin {
  0%, 100% { transform: scaleX(1); }
  50% { transform: scaleX(0.1); }
}

/* ===== ë’¤ë¡œ ë²„íŠ¼ ===== */
.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: 20px;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  color: white;
  border: 3px solid white;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  z-index: 100;
}

.back-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ì œëª© ===== */
.screen-title {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
}

/* ===== í¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
}

.pixel-label {
  display: block;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;

}

.pixel-input {

/* ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë¹Œë” ===== */
.quiz-builder {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 20px;

  overflow-y: auto;

}

.quiz-builder .form-group {

}

.quiz-builder-buttons {

}

}

.questions-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin: 20px 0;
}

.question-card {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.95);

.question-header {

}

.question-number {

}

.delete-question-btn {

}

}

.question-input {

}

.question-type-select {

}

/* ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• ì˜µì…˜ ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.options-wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 160px;
  max-height: 160px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  overflow: hidden;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .options-wrapper {
    min-height: 320px;
    max-height: 320px;
  }
}

.options-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.option-input-group {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 5px;
}

.option-radio {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  cursor: pointer;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.option-input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 6px 8px;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 13px;
  border: 2px solid #ddd;
  min-width: 0;
}

.option-input:nth-child(1) { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(1) .option-input { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(2) .option-input { border-color: var(--primary); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(3) .option-input { border-color: var(--warning); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(4) .option-input { border-color: var(--success); }

.time-select {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  background: white;
}

/* ===== í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ëŒ€ê¸°ì‹¤ ===== */
.room-code-display {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  animation: slide-down 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slide-down {
  from { transform: translateY(-50px); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.code-label {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.code-box {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  color: #1e1b4b;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 10px;
  animation: glow 2s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes glow {
  0%, 100% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 20px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.5); }
  50% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 40px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.8); }
}

.code-hint {

  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 15px;
}

.participants-panel {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  border: 4px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
  border-radius: 10px;
  padding: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.participants-header {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.mushroom {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  animation: bounce 0.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-5px); }
}

.participants-list {
  min-height: 100px;
  max-height: 200px;
  overflow-y: auto;
}

.waiting-text {
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);

  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.participant-item {

  align-items: center;

  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);

  animation: pop-in 0.3s ease-out;
}

@keyframes pop-in {
  from { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.participant-avatar {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.participant-name {
  color: white;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {
  text-align: center;
  animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.player-avatar {
  font-size: 5rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.player-name {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.waiting-message {
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.8);
  font-size: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.loading-blocks {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.block {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: var(--primary);
  border: 4px solid var(--primary-dark);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: block-bounce 0.6s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.block:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-15px); }
}

.quiz-info, .participants-info {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;
  background: var(--success) !important;
  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {
  animation: shake 0.5s ease-out;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* ===== OX í€´ì¦ˆ, ì£¼ê´€ì‹, ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.ox-options,
.text-options,
.slider-options {
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: stretch;
}

.slider-options .form-group,
.text-options .form-group {
  margin-bottom: 6px;
}

.slider-options .form-group .pixel-label,
.text-options .form-group .pixel-label {
  margin-bottom: 4px;
  font-size: 12px;
}

.slider-options .question-input,
.text-options .question-input {
  padding: 6px 10px;
  font-size: 14px;
}

.ox-select-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 15px;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 10px 0;
}

.ox-option {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.ox-option input {
  display: none;
}

.ox-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 80px;
  height: 50px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 8px;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.ox-label.ox-o {
  background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.1);
}

.ox-label.ox-x {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-o {
  background: var(--success);
  color: white;
  border-color: #15803d;
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-x {
  background: var(--danger);
  color: white;
  border-color: #b91c1c;
}

.ox-answer-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
}

.ox-btn {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 300px;
  font-size: 2rem !important;
  padding: 40px 20px !important;
}

.ox-o-btn {
  background: var(--success) !important;
}

.ox-x-btn {
  background: var(--danger) !important;
}

/* ===== ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.text-answer-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 20px;
}

.text-answer-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 20px;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  text-align: center;
  border: 4px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  outline: none;
}

.text-answer-input:focus {
  border-color: var(--primary);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3), var(--box-shadow);
}

.submit-text-btn {
  background: var(--primary) !important;
  color: white !important;
  border-color: var(--primary-dark) !important;
  padding: 15px 50px !important;
}

@keyframes correct-pulse {
  0% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); }
}

@keyframes shake {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
  25% { transform: translateX(-10px); }
  75% { transform: translateX(10px); }
}

.answer-status {
  margin-top: 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

/* ===== ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ë‹µë³€ ===== */
.slider-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 20px;
  background: white;
  border: 4px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

.slider-value {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--secondary);
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.slider-input {
  width: 100%;
  height: 20px;
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--danger), var(--warning), var(--success));
  border-radius: 10px;
  outline: none;
}

.slider-input::-webkit-slider-thumb {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  width: 40px;

```css
/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;

}

/* ===== ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
* {

body {

}

.game-container {

}

/* ===== ë°°ê²½ ì¥ì‹ (ê¹”ë”í•œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) ===== */
.cloud, .ground, .pipe, .brick {

}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {

  background-image: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ê¸°ë³¸ ===== */
.screen {

/* ===== ë©”ì¸ ë©”ë‰´ ===== */
.title-container {

}

@keyframes bounce-in {
  0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.game-title {
  display: flex;

}

/* ===== ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */

.retro-btn:active {

/* ===== ë’¤ë¡œ ë²„íŠ¼ ===== */
.back-btn {

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ì œëª© ===== */
.screen-title {

/* ===== í¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {

  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {

@keyframes question-pop {

  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);

  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;

/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;
  --font-pixel-en: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

/* ===== ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 16px;
  background: var(--bg-gradient);
  min-height: 100vh;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow-soft);
}

.game-container {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* ===== ë°°ê²½ ì¥ì‹ (ê¹”ë”í•œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) ===== */
.cloud, .ground, .pipe, .brick {
  display: none;
}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 75% 75%, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  z-index: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ê¸°ë³¸ ===== */
.screen {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 80px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
  flex: 1;
}

.screen.active {
  display: flex;
}

/* ===== ë©”ì¸ ë©”ë‰´ ===== */
.title-container {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: bounce-in 0.8s ease-out;
}

@keyframes bounce-in {
  0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.game-title {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

.title-super {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--warning);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

.title-quiz {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  color: var(--secondary);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: pulse 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.title-bros {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--accent);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
}

.subtitle {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* ===== ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.menu-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.retro-btn {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.1s;
  position: relative;
  min-width: 280px;
}

.retro-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 4px;
  left: 4px;
  right: -4px;
  bottom: -4px;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  z-index: -1;
}

.retro-btn:hover {
  transform: translate(2px, 2px);
}

.retro-btn:hover::before {
  top: 2px;
  left: 2px;
  right: -2px;
  bottom: -2px;
}

.retro-btn:active {
  transform: translate(4px, 4px);
}

.retro-btn:active::before {
  display: none;
}

.retro-btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

.host-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #f472b6 0%, var(--secondary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #9d174d;
  border: 4px solid #9d174d;
}

.join-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #818cf8 0%, var(--primary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #3730a3;
  border: 4px solid #3730a3;
}

.start-btn, .start-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);

  border: 4px solid #b45309;
}

.add-question-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #5eead4 0%, var(--accent) 100%);

  text-shadow: none;
  border: 4px solid #0f766e;

}

.join-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #a78bfa 0%, #8b5cf6 100%);

}

.play-again-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fb923c 0%, #f97316 100%);

  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #c2410c;

}

.btn-icon {

}

.coin-counter {
  display: flex;

  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);

}

@keyframes blink {
  0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
  50% { opacity: 0.5; }
}

}

.coin-text {

}

@keyframes spin-coin {
  0%, 100% { transform: scaleX(1); }
  50% { transform: scaleX(0.1); }
}

/* ===== ë’¤ë¡œ ë²„íŠ¼ ===== */
.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: 20px;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  color: white;
  border: 3px solid white;

  transition: all 0.2s;

}

.back-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ì œëª© ===== */
.screen-title {

}

/* ===== í¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.form-group {

}

.pixel-label {
  display: block;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;

}

.pixel-input {

/* ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë¹Œë” ===== */
.quiz-builder {

}

.quiz-builder .form-group {

.questions-container {

.question-card {

.question-input {

/* ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• ì˜µì…˜ ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.options-wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 160px;
  max-height: 160px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  overflow: hidden;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .options-wrapper {
    min-height: 320px;
    max-height: 320px;
  }
}

.options-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.option-input-group {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 5px;
}

.option-radio {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  cursor: pointer;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.option-input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 6px 8px;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 13px;
  border: 2px solid #ddd;
  min-width: 0;
}

.option-input:nth-child(1) { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(1) .option-input { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(2) .option-input { border-color: var(--primary); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(3) .option-input { border-color: var(--warning); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(4) .option-input { border-color: var(--success); }

.time-select {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  background: white;
}

/* ===== í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ëŒ€ê¸°ì‹¤ ===== */
.room-code-display {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  animation: slide-down 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slide-down {
  from { transform: translateY(-50px); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.code-label {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);

}

.code-box {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;

  color: #1e1b4b;

}

@keyframes glow {
  0%, 100% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 20px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.5); }
  50% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 40px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.8); }
}

}

.participants-panel {

}

.mushroom {

}

}

.participants-list {

}

}

}

@keyframes pop-in {
  from { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.participant-avatar {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

  color: white;

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {
  text-align: center;
  animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.player-avatar {
  font-size: 5rem;

}

}

}

.block {

  border: 4px solid var(--primary-dark);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: block-bounce 0.6s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.block:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-15px); }
}

.quiz-info, .participants-info {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }

```css
/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;
  --font-pixel-en: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

/* ===== ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 16px;
  background: var(--bg-gradient);
  min-height: 100vh;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow-soft);
}

.game-container {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* ===== ë°°ê²½ ì¥ì‹ (ê¹”ë”í•œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) ===== */
.cloud, .ground, .pipe, .brick {
  display: none;
}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 75% 75%, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  z-index: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ê¸°ë³¸ ===== */
.screen {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 80px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
  flex: 1;
}

.screen.active {
  display: flex;
}

/* ===== ë©”ì¸ ë©”ë‰´ ===== */
.title-container {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: bounce-in 0.8s ease-out;
}

@keyframes bounce-in {
  0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.game-title {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

.title-super {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--warning);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

.title-quiz {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  color: var(--secondary);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: pulse 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.title-bros {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--accent);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
}

.subtitle {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* ===== ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.menu-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.retro-btn {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.1s;
  position: relative;
  min-width: 280px;
}

.retro-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 4px;
  left: 4px;
  right: -4px;
  bottom: -4px;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);

}

.retro-btn:hover {
  transform: translate(2px, 2px);
}

.retro-btn:hover::before {
  top: 2px;
  left: 2px;
  right: -2px;
  bottom: -2px;
}

.retro-btn:active {
  transform: translate(4px, 4px);
}

.retro-btn:active::before {
  display: none;
}

.retro-btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;

}

.host-btn {

.play-again-btn {

.btn-icon {

.coin-counter {

  font-size: 0.8rem;

@keyframes blink {

@keyframes spin-coin {
  0%, 100% { transform: scaleX(1); }

}

/* ===== ë’¤ë¡œ ë²„íŠ¼ ===== */
.back-btn {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: 20px;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  color: white;
  border: 3px solid white;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  z-index: 100;
}

.back-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ì œëª© ===== */
.screen-title {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
}

/* ===== í¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
}

.pixel-label {
  display: block;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.pixel-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 15px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  background: #fff;
  border: 4px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  outline: none;
}

.pixel-input:focus {
  border-color: var(--mario-yellow);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(251, 208, 0, 0.3), var(--box-shadow);
}

.pixel-input.code-input {
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: 5px;
  text-align: center;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

/* ===== í€´ì¦ˆ ë¹Œë” ===== */
.quiz-builder {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 20px;
  max-height: 70vh;
  overflow-y: auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
}

.quiz-builder .form-group {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.quiz-builder-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.quiz-builder-buttons .retro-btn {
  flex: 1;
  min-width: auto;
}

.questions-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin: 20px 0;
  width: 100%;
}

.question-card {
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.95);
  border: 4px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 20px;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.question-header {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  padding-bottom: 10px;
  border-bottom: 3px dashed #ccc;
}

.question-number {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--secondary);
}

.delete-question-btn {
  background: var(--danger);
  color: white;
  border: none;
  width: 30px;
  height: 30px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform 0.2s;
}

.delete-question-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

.question-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.question-type-select {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  background: white;
}

/* ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• ì˜µì…˜ ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.options-wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 160px;
  max-height: 160px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  overflow: hidden;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .options-wrapper {
    min-height: 320px;
    max-height: 320px;
  }
}

.options-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

.option-input-group {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 5px;
}

.option-radio {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  cursor: pointer;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.option-input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 6px 8px;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 13px;
  border: 2px solid #ddd;
  min-width: 0;
}

.option-input:nth-child(1) { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(1) .option-input { border-color: var(--danger); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(2) .option-input { border-color: var(--primary); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(3) .option-input { border-color: var(--warning); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(4) .option-input { border-color: var(--success); }

.time-select {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  background: white;
}

/* ===== í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ëŒ€ê¸°ì‹¤ ===== */
.room-code-display {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  animation: slide-down 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slide-down {
  from { transform: translateY(-50px); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.code-label {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.code-box {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  color: #1e1b4b;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 10px;
  animation: glow 2s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes glow {
  0%, 100% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 20px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.5); }
  50% { box-shadow: var(--box-shadow), 0 0 40px rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.8); }
}

.code-hint {
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 15px;
}

.participants-panel {
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  border: 4px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
  border-radius: 10px;
  padding: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 400px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.participants-header {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.mushroom {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  animation: bounce 0.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-5px); }
}

.participants-list {
  min-height: 100px;
  max-height: 200px;
  overflow-y: auto;
}

.waiting-text {
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.participant-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  padding: 10px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  animation: pop-in 0.3s ease-out;
}

@keyframes pop-in {
  from { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.participant-avatar {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
}

.participant-name {
  color: white;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {
  text-align: center;
  animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.player-avatar {
  font-size: 5rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.player-name {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.waiting-message {
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.8);
  font-size: 1rem;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.loading-blocks {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.block {
  width: 50px;
  height: 50px;
  background: var(--primary);
  border: 4px solid var(--primary-dark);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: block-bounce 0.6s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.block:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-15px); }
}

.quiz-info, .participants-info {
  color: white;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;
  background: var(--success) !important;
  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {
  animation: shake 0.5s ease-out;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* ===== OX í€´ì¦ˆ, ì£¼ê´€ì‹, ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.ox-options,
.text-options {
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: stretch;
}

.slider-options {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 8px;
  align-items: flex-end;
  justify-content: center;
}

.slider-options .form-group {
  margin-bottom: 0;
  flex: 1;
  min-width: 80px;
  max-width: 120px;
}

.text-options .form-group {
  margin-bottom: 6px;
}

.slider-options .form-group .pixel-label,
.text-options .form-group .pixel-label {
  margin-bottom: 4px;
  font-size: 11px;
}

.slider-options .question-input,
.text-options .question-input {
  padding: 6px 8px;
  font-size: 13px;
}

.ox-select-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 15px;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 10px 0;
}

.ox-option {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.ox-option input {
  display: none;
}

.ox-label {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 80px;
  height: 50px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  border: 3px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 8px;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.ox-label.ox-o {
  background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.1);
}

.ox-label.ox-x {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-o {
  background: var(--success);
  color: white;
  border-color: #15803d;
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-x {
  background: var(--danger);
  color: white;
  border-color: #b91c1c;
}

.ox-answer-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
}

.ox-btn {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 300px;
  font-size: 2rem !important;
  padding: 40px 20px !important;
}

.ox-o-btn {
  background: var(--success) !important;
}

.ox-x-btn {
  background: var(--danger) !important;
}

/* ===== ì£¼ê´€ì‹ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.text-answer-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 20px;
}

.text-answer-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 20px;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  text-align: center;
  border: 4px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  outline: none;
}

.text-answer-input:focus {
  border-color: var(--primary);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3), var(--box-shadow);
}

.submit-text-btn {
  background: var(--primary) !important;
  color: white !important;
  border-color: var(--primary-dark) !important;
  padding: 15px 50px !important;
}

@keyframes correct-pulse {
  0% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); }
}

@keyframes shake {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
  25% { transform: translateX(-10px); }
  75% { transform: translateX(10px); }
}

.answer-status {
  margin-top: 20px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

/* ===== ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ë‹µë³€ ===== */
.slider-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 600px;
  padding: 20px;
  background: white;
  border: 4px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

.slider-value {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--secondary);
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.slider-input {
  width: 100%;
  height: 20px;
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--danger), var(--warning), var(--success));
  border-radius: 10px;
  outline: none;
}

.slider-input::-webkit-slider-thumb {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: white;
  border: 4px solid #333;
  border-radius: 50%;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.slider-labels {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin-top: 10px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  color: #666;
}

.submit-slider-btn {
  margin-top: 20px;
  padding: 15px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  background: var(--success);
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid #15803d;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* ===== ì •ë‹µ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.answer-title {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  animation: bounce-in 0.5s ease-out;
}

.answer-title.correct { color: var(--success); }
.answer-title.incorrect { color: var(--danger); }

.correct-answer-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid var(--success);
  padding: 30px 50px;
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
}

.correct-label {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #666;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.correct-answer {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: var(--success);
  font-weight: bold;
}

.leaderboard-mini {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 500px;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  border: 4px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
  border-radius: 10px;
  padding: 20px;
}

.leaderboard-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 12px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.leaderboard-item:nth-child(1) { background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.3); }
.leaderboard-item:nth-child(2) { background: rgba(192, 192, 192, 0.3); }
.leaderboard-item:nth-child(3) { background: rgba(205, 127, 50, 0.3); }

.leaderboard-rank {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  width: 40px;
}

.leaderboard-name {
  flex: 1;
  color: white;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.leaderboard-score {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: var(--warning);
}

.leaderboard-points {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: var(--success);
  margin-left: 15px;
}

/* ===== ìµœì¢… ê²°ê³¼ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.results-title {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--warning);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: trophy-shine 2s ease-in-out infinite;
}

@keyframes trophy-shine {
  0%, 100% { filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.5)); }
  50% { filter: drop-shadow(0 0 30px rgba(255, 215, 0, 1)); }
}

.podium {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-end;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.podium-place {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  animation: rise-up 0.8s ease-out;
}

@keyframes rise-up {
  from { transform: translateY(100px); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.podium-place.first { animation-delay: 0.4s; animation-fill-mode: backwards; }
.podium-place.second { animation-delay: 0.2s; animation-fill-mode: backwards; }
.podium-place.third { animation-delay: 0.6s; animation-fill-mode: backwards; }

.player-medal {
  font-size: 3rem;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.podium-place .player-name {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  max-width: 100px;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.podium-place .player-score {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.7rem;
  color: var(--warning);
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.podium-block {
  width: 100px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  border: 4px solid #333;
}

.podium-place.first .podium-block {
  height: 120px;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #ffd700 0%, #b8860b 100%);
}

.podium-place.second .podium-block {
  height: 90px;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #c0c0c0 0%, #808080 100%);
}

.podium-place.third .podium-block {
  height: 60px;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #cd7f32 0%, #8b4513 100%);
}

.full-results {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 500px;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  border: 4px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);

  position: absolute;

  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;
  background: var(--success) !important;
  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {
  animation: shake 0.5s ease-out;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* ===== OX í€´ì¦ˆ, ì£¼ê´€ì‹, ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */

```css
/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {
  --primary: #6366f1;
  --primary-dark: #4f46e5;
  --secondary: #ec4899;
  --accent: #14b8a6;
  --success: #22c55e;
  --warning: #f59e0b;
  --danger: #ef4444;
  --bg-gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e1b4b 0%, #312e81 50%, #1e1b4b 100%);
  --text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #000, -2px -2px 0 #000, 2px -2px 0 #000, -2px 2px 0 #000;
  --text-shadow-soft: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  --box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 #000;
  --pixel-border: 4px solid #000;
  --font-pixel-kr: 'Galmuri11', 'DotGothic16', monospace;
  --font-pixel-en: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

/* ===== ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);
  font-size: 16px;
  background: var(--bg-gradient);
  min-height: 100vh;
  overflow-x: hidden;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow-soft);
}

.game-container {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100vh;
  max-width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* ===== ë°°ê²½ ì¥ì‹ (ê¹”ë”í•œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) ===== */
.cloud, .ground, .pipe, .brick {
  display: none;
}

/* ë°°ê²½ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ íŒ¨í„´ */
.game-container::before {
  content: '';
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  background-image: 
    radial-gradient(circle at 25% 25%, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%),
    radial-gradient(circle at 75% 75%, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);
  z-index: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ===== í™”ë©´ ê¸°ë³¸ ===== */
.screen {
  display: none;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  min-height: 100vh;
  padding: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 80px;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
  flex: 1;
}

.screen.active {
  display: flex;
}

/* ===== ë©”ì¸ ë©”ë‰´ ===== */
.title-container {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: bounce-in 0.8s ease-out;
}

@keyframes bounce-in {
  0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
  100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
}

.game-title {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
}

.title-super {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--warning);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

.title-quiz {
  font-size: 3.5rem;
  color: var(--secondary);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  animation: pulse 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}

.title-bros {
  font-size: 2rem;
  color: var(--accent);
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  letter-spacing: 5px;
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); }
  50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
}

.subtitle {
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  margin-top: 20px;
}

/* ===== ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.menu-buttons {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.retro-btn {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 15px;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.1s;
  position: relative;
  min-width: 280px;
}

.retro-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 4px;
  left: 4px;
  right: -4px;
  bottom: -4px;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  z-index: -1;
}

.retro-btn:hover {
  transform: translate(2px, 2px);
}

.retro-btn:hover::before {
  top: 2px;
  left: 2px;
  right: -2px;
  bottom: -2px;
}

.retro-btn:active {
  transform: translate(4px, 4px);
}

.retro-btn:active::before {
  display: none;
}

.retro-btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

.host-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #f472b6 0%, var(--secondary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #9d174d;
  border: 4px solid #9d174d;
}

.join-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #818cf8 0%, var(--primary) 100%);
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 #3730a3;
  border: 4px solid #3730a3;
}

.start-btn, .start-game-btn {
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, #fbbf24 0%, var(--warning) 100%);
  color: #333;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.5);
  border: 4px solid #b45309;
}

.add-question-btn {

/* ===== ë¬¸ì œ ìœ í˜• ì˜µì…˜ ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.options-wrapper {
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 160px;
  max-height: 160px;

}

}

  overflow: hidden;
}

}

}

.option-input:nth-child(1) { border-color: var(--danger); }

.option-input-group:nth-child(2) .option-input { border-color: var(--primary); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(3) .option-input { border-color: var(--warning); }
.option-input-group:nth-child(4) .option-input { border-color: var(--success); }

/* ===== í˜¸ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ëŒ€ê¸°ì‹¤ ===== */
.room-code-display {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  animation: slide-down 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes slide-down {
  from { transform: translateY(-50px); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.code-label {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 0.8rem;

}

@keyframes glow {

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;
  background: var(--success) !important;
  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {
  animation: shake 0.5s ease-out;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* ===== OX í€´ì¦ˆ, ì£¼ê´€ì‹, ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
.ox-options,
.text-options {
  justify-content: center;

}

.slider-options {
  display: flex;

}

}

}

}

}

.ox-select-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 15px;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 10px 0;
}

.ox-option {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.ox-option input {
  display: none;
}

.ox-label {
  display: flex;

  justify-content: center;
  width: 80px;
  height: 50px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-family: var(--font-pixel-kr);

  border-radius: 8px;

}

  background: rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.1);
}

.ox-label.ox-x {
  background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1);
}

  background: var(--success);
  color: white;
  border-color: #15803d;
}

.ox-option input:checked + .ox-label.ox-x {
  background: var(--danger);
  color: white;
  border-color: #b91c1c;
}

.ox-answer-container {
  display: flex;
  gap: 20px;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
}

.ox-btn {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 300px;
  font-size: 2rem !important;
  padding: 40px 20px !important;
}

.ox-o-btn {
  background: var(--success) !important;
}

.ox-x-btn {
  background: var(--danger) !important;
}

/* ===== CSS ë³€ìˆ˜ ===== */
:root {

.options-wrapper {

}

/* ===== ì°¸ê°€ì ëŒ€ê¸° í™”ë©´ ===== */
.player-waiting {

.block {

}

.block:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.block:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

@keyframes block-bounce {

/* ===== ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ í™”ë©´ ===== */
.game-header {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

.question-counter {

  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  padding: 10px 20px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.timer-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 200px;
  height: 40px;
  background: #333;
  border: 4px solid #000;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.timer-bar {
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success) 0%, var(--warning) 50%, var(--danger) 100%);
  transition: width 1s linear;
  width: 100%;
}

.timer-text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-family: 'Press Start 2P', cursive;
  font-size: 1rem;
  color: white;
  text-shadow: var(--text-shadow);
}

.question-box {
  background: white;
  border: 6px solid #333;
  box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
  padding: 30px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: question-pop 0.5s ease-out;
}

@keyframes question-pop {
  from { transform: scale(0.8) rotateX(20deg); opacity: 0; }
  to { transform: scale(1) rotateX(0); opacity: 1; }
}

.question-text {
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  color: #333;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.answers-container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 15px;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 800px;
}

@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .answers-container {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
}

.answer-btn {
  padding: 25px 20px;
  font-family: 'DotGothic16', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color: white;
  border: 4px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.answer-btn::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: -100%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.3), transparent);
  transition: left 0.5s;
}

.answer-btn:hover::before {
  left: 100%;
}

.answer-btn:hover {
  transform: scale(1.02);
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}

.answer-btn.selected {
  transform: scale(0.98);
  filter: brightness(0.9);
  border-width: 6px;
}

.answer-btn:nth-child(1) { background: var(--danger); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(2) { background: var(--primary); }
.answer-btn:nth-child(3) { background: var(--warning); color: #333; }
.answer-btn:nth-child(4) { background: var(--success); }

.answer-btn.correct {
  animation: correct-pulse 0.5s ease-out;
  background: var(--success) !important;
  color: white !important;
}

.answer-btn.incorrect {
  animation: shake 0.5s ease-out;
  opacity: 0.5;
}

/* ===== OX í€´ì¦ˆ, ì£¼ê´€ì‹, ìŠ¬ë¼ì´ë” ê³µí†µ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ ===== */
